translation.en: [female radio host] It's 75 degrees in sunny San Diego,
translation.zh: ‎阳光明媚的圣地亚哥 现在气温24度

translation.en: and the number one song of the day is still "Blush" by Koop.
translation.zh:
‎今日排名首位的歌曲
‎依旧是库普的《脸红》

translation.en: ♪ I feel your eyes on me ♪
♪ You should know better… ♪
Whoo!
♪ You put on the pressure ♪
♪ Something tells me I, I should not let go… ♪
translation.zh: ‎某种感觉告诉我 我不该就此放手

translation.en: Whoo! It's my birthday! It's my birthday!
translation.zh: ‎某种感觉告诉我 我不知道 ‎今天是我的生日！

translation.en: ♪ I've been working hard… ♪
translation.zh: ‎我一直在努力 想让你看到

translation.en: Whoo! Here we go! Here we go! Here we go!
translation.zh: ‎我一直在努力 想让你看到 ‎你有多让我着迷…

translation.en: Yeah! Whoo!
It's an impromptu dance party with my best friend since first grade!
translation.zh:
‎跟我从一年级起就最要好的朋友
‎来场即兴热舞派对！

translation.en: -Because it's your birthday! -[both screaming]
Go, go. Work, work. Drop it low. Oh.
translation.zh: ‎用力跳 扭起来 压低腰

translation.en: I love this song, but I'm very hungry.
translation.zh: ‎这首歌我很爱 可我肚子太饿了

translation.en: Okay, I need your help.
Question. What do you think? Quarter-life chic? Or quarter-life crisis?
translation.zh:
‎问你啊 你觉得这身怎么样？
‎是青年时尚呢？还是青年危机？

translation.en: Huh. Well, right now, you're matching the lamp, so…
translation.zh: ‎你这身跟台灯挺配的 所以嘛…

translation.en: -Would a hat help? -[chuckles] No.
Rude!
-Here. -Thank you.
Okay, for my Cassie-palooza kickoff night, we are gonna start off at the club
translation.zh: ‎好了 凯茜狂欢周的开幕 ‎我们先从夜店开始

translation.en: where I've spent all afternoon decorating the VIP area.
translation.zh:
‎我已经花了一整个下午
‎把贵宾区都布置好了

translation.en: -Hey, I have this crazy idea. -[mouth full] I'm listening.
translation.zh:
‎喂 我突发奇想哦 ‎-洗耳恭听
‎-与其跑外头去过你的生日

translation.en: Instead of going out for your birthday, what if we just stay home,
translation.zh:
‎-洗耳恭听
‎-与其跑外头去过你的生日 ‎不如我们就待在家里
‎一起穿上弹力裤

translation.en: and we put on our stretchy pants, and we puzzle like we used to,
translation.zh:
‎不如我们就待在家里
‎一起穿上弹力裤 ‎我们还像以前那样玩拼图
‎然后点一些外卖面条？

translation.en: and we order more noodles?
translation.zh:
‎我们还像以前那样玩拼图
‎然后点一些外卖面条？

translation.en: No, no. We're not staying in. It's my birthday week.
translation.zh:
‎我们可不能待在家里
‎这是我的生日周啊

translation.en: I have to ring in 25 with style!
translation.zh: ‎我25岁了 必须开个潇洒的头才行！

translation.en: You've rung in the past four years with style. One night in won't kill you.
translation.zh:
‎过去四年你年年都开得很潇洒
‎就一晚而已 不会死人的

translation.en: Besides, we haven't puzzled in weeks. I mean, look at Mona.
translation.zh:
‎而且啊 我们已经好几周没玩拼图了 ‎瞧瞧蒙娜 她的微笑都不见了
‎这样怪郁闷的

translation.en: She is missing her smile, and it's kind of depressing.
translation.zh:
‎瞧瞧蒙娜 她的微笑都不见了
‎这样怪郁闷的

translation.en: I'm not bailing on my kickoff party. It is tradition. My friends expect this.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我可不能错过自己的开幕派对 ‎这可是传统 我的朋友们都期待着呢

translation.en: Well, your best friend has a huge week ahead of her.
translation.zh:
‎可对你最要好的朋友来说
‎下周非常重要

translation.en: I was just added as one of the junior research assistants
on a team studying marsupial fossil teeth.
translation.zh: ‎加入有袋类动物化石牙齿的研究小组

translation.en: I don't fully understand what that means, but congratulations! [squeals]
translation.zh: ‎虽然我不能完全明白这什么意思 ‎但恭喜你呀！

translation.en: I'm one of three assistants, so it's really not a big--
translation.zh:
‎我只是三个助理中的一个
‎所以其实也没什么了不起…

translation.en: No, no! It is a big deal. You should celebrate.
translation.zh: ‎不！这很了不起 你应该庆祝一下

translation.en: Because guess what? Tonight is… [singsong] …a celebration!
translation.zh:
‎因为啊 你猜怎么着？
‎今晚正适合庆祝！

translation.en: Okay. I'm gonna go change. Again.
So should you. Tonight'll be fun, I promise.
translation.zh:
‎你也去换一身
‎今晚肯定会很好玩 我保证

translation.en: We leave in an hour-ish.
Love you, my bestie since we were six!
translation.zh: ‎爱你哦 我六岁就认识的好闺蜜！

translation.en: Okay.
Whoo! Did I tell you how cute you look by the way?
Uh, yeah, I think you did, like, 19 times. Got it.
translation.zh: ‎你好像说过了 大概有19次 听到了

translation.en: Good. I meant it every single time. You look adorable.
translation.zh:
‎那就好 我每句都是真心的
‎你看起来真是可爱死了

translation.en: -I love this dress on you. -Thank you. So, who's coming tonight?
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 凯茜 今晚都有谁会来啊？

translation.en: Okay. So Kayla's coming. Maddie's coming.
translation.zh: ‎是这样的 凯拉会来 玛迪会来

translation.en: Moving in?
Oh, hi.
Of course you're moving in. I don't know why I just said that.
translation.zh:
‎你很显然是在搬家
‎我都不知道我干嘛要问这个

translation.en: Hi, we're your neighbors.
I'm Cassie, and my quiet but highly intelligent roommate is--
translation.zh:
‎我叫凯茜
‎而我这位恬静却聪慧绝顶的室友叫…

translation.en: Lisa. Lisa.
Um, I'm around dinosaur bones all day,
translation.zh: ‎我整天都在跟恐龙骨头打交道

translation.en: so I'm not really used to talking to people that much.
translation.zh: ‎所以呢 我不是很适应跟人聊天

translation.en: -Right. -Works in the Museum of Natural History.
translation.zh:
‎-是哦
‎-她在自然历史博物馆工作

translation.en: Oh wow! Yeah, I compose music for video games all day,
translation.zh: ‎是啊 我整天都在给电子游戏做音乐

translation.en: so not a lot of human interaction for me either.
Sorry, I'm Max, by the way.
Ordinarily, I'd shake your hand, but I'd almost certainly drop this,
translation.zh: ‎通常我是应该要跟你们握个手 ‎但那样的话 这就肯定要掉地上了

translation.en: um, and I desperately need these dishes.
-Oh! Here. Let me open the door for you. -Brilliant. Cool.
translation.zh:
‎-来 我帮你开门
‎-太好了 ‎好

translation.en: Cool.
Okay, we've gotta go, but, um, welcome to the neighborhood, Max.
translation.zh:
‎好 我们得走了
‎欢迎你住到这儿来 麦克斯

translation.en: -Yeah, thanks. See ya. -Yeah. Yeah.
-Oh, don't give me that look. -What look? I wasn't giving a look.
translation.zh:
‎-别那样看着我
‎-怎样看着你啊 我才没有呢

translation.en: -You wanna play matchmaker? -I didn't say that.
translation.zh:
‎-你想当红娘吗？
‎-我可没这么说

translation.en: Since you mentioned it, I did notice a spark.
translation.zh:
‎既然你说了
‎我刚才确实发现擦出了火花

translation.en: -There was a spark? -Mm!
No, there was no spark.
I'm… I'm really focused on work right now, and I can't have any distractions.
translation.zh: ‎我现在必须把心思全放在工作上 ‎可不能被别的东西分心了

translation.en: Not even in the form of our new neighbor and his cute accent?
translation.zh:
‎即便是我们的新邻居
‎和他那可爱的口音也不行？

translation.en: I'm not like you.
-Okay. -No, no!
I just mean you can juggle a social life. That's not me.
translation.zh:
‎我的意思是你能兼顾社交生活
‎我没这个本事

translation.en: Yeah, well, I'm a party planner. It's built into the job.
translation.zh:
‎毕竟我是派对策划人
‎可以说这是工作的一部分

translation.en: Well, I'm on a path here.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 我现在算走上了工作的正道

translation.en: Nail this junior research position, get promoted to field researcher,
translation.zh:
‎做好这个初级研究的职位
‎晋升为实地研究员

translation.en: and then work alongside my paleontologist hero.
translation.zh:
‎然后就能跟我古生物学界的偶像
‎并肩工作了

translation.en: Hey, I wanna introduce you to my friend Fun.
translation.zh:
‎对了 我一直想给你介绍个朋友
‎它叫“休闲”

translation.en: I don't know if you two have ever met.
translation.zh: ‎我感觉你俩还从没见过面呢

translation.en: [Lisa] Let me get through all of this stuff first, okay?
translation.zh: ‎让我先把这些事处理完 好吗？

translation.en: Downward Dad is out of control. He posts a different pose every day.
translation.zh:
‎“下犬爹”简直是失了控
‎他每天都要发一个新动作

translation.en: -[chuckles] I liked his flying crow. -Okay, do not encourage him.
translation.zh:
‎-我挺喜欢他的飞鸦式的
‎-喂 别鼓励他好吗？

translation.en: What? Wait. It's not just me. Do you see how many people like his yoga studio?
translation.zh:
‎不只我而已 ‎你看到有多少人
‎赞了他的瑜伽工作室吗？

translation.en: Oh, I know. I've heard from everyone how amazing his classes are.
translation.zh:
‎噢 能不知道吗？
‎是个人都跟我说他的课有多棒

translation.en: We should take one.
No, I'm good.
I got enough secondhand yoga from him growing up that I am centered for life.
translation.zh:
‎从小到大我已经从他那里
‎吸了太多的二手瑜伽 ‎够我天人合一一辈子了

translation.en: I think it's sweet that he's on social media.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得他上社交媒体挺可爱的

translation.en: It's like he's trying to connect with you.
Yeah, I love him, but he's my dad, not my buddy.
translation.zh: ‎对 我爱他 但他是我爸 不是我朋友

translation.en: I'm fine with our lives being separate.
translation.zh: ‎我不介意我们的生活没有交集

translation.en: Okay. Well, if you just left one comment, it would probably make his day.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 但要是你能留个言的话
‎他肯定会很开心的

translation.en: Fine. I'll throw him a like, but no comment. -You happy? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 我就给他点个赞
‎但留言就算了 满意了吧？

translation.en: [Lisa] So this is, like, our 19th Cassie-palooza kickoff.
translation.zh:
‎这好像是我们第19个
‎凯茜狂欢周的开幕了

translation.en: [Cassie] It's gonna be the best ever!
Hey, Bob.
Good evening, Cassie.
-Thank you. -Ladies, welcome.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢你咯
‎-女士们 欢迎光临

translation.en: She's my favorite person. I love her so much.
translation.zh: ‎她是我最喜欢的人 我真是太爱她了

translation.en: [man] Cassie's here!
-Wow. This is actually really pretty. -Hi!
-[woman] Happy birthday, Cassie! -[Cassie] Whoo!
[man 2] Happy birthday! It's so good to see you.
translation.zh:
‎生日快乐！ ‎-很高兴见到你
‎-今天不是我生日 杰里米

translation.en: It's not my birthday, Jeremy. Not my birthday.
translation.zh:
‎-很高兴见到你
‎-今天不是我生日 杰里米

translation.en: You are the best!
[screams] Yes!
[man] Cassie! Drink, drink, drink!
-["Blush" by Koop playing] -[gasps] It's our song. -It's Koop! -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-这是我们的歌 是库普
‎-对

translation.en: -We have to dance! -[Lisa] Okay.
Come on! Come on!
Go, girl! Go, girl! Go, go! Break it down. Break it down.
Go, Lisa! Go, Lisa!
Yeah!
[woman 2] Yes, Cassie!
I'm flying!
Careful! You're gonna get hurt.
-[crowd chanting] Drink! Drink! -Here! It's your birthday!
Should I do it? Should I do it? Okay.
-[crowd chanting] More! More! More! More! -Oh yeah!
-[Cassie] So much fun! You! -[woman] You kept drinking shots.
translation.zh:
‎真是太好玩了！ ‎-你啊！
‎-你刚才一直不停灌烈酒

translation.en: Because you kept handing them to me!
You're crazy! You're-- I can't keep up with you.
translation.zh: ‎你太疯了！我没办法跟你拼酒

translation.en: Okay, you guys, next stop is Roddy's house.
I rented a waterslide that goes from the roof into his pool!
translation.zh:
‎我租了个水上滑梯
‎从屋顶上一路滑到他的泳池里！

translation.en: What's wrong?
You're bailing, aren't you?
I bet you no one would notice if we snuck back home right now.
translation.zh:
‎我打赌要是我们现在偷偷回家去
‎没有人会注意到的

translation.en: I would notice!
You know that these people are terrible, right?
translation.zh: ‎你知道这些人都不怎么样 对吧？

translation.en: They're just trying to have a good time, which is exactly what you should be doing!
translation.zh:
‎他们只是想玩个痛快
‎这正是你应该做的事！来吧！

translation.en: -Come on. -I like having a good time too.
Only I wanna do it
with people who'd actually care if something happened to me,
translation.zh:
‎会找那些真正在乎我
‎不想看到我出事的人

translation.en: or who would like me even if I didn't rent a very dangerous waterslide.
translation.zh:
‎那些就算我没有租一个
‎非常危险的水上滑梯 ‎也会喜欢我的人

translation.en: Don't tell me you're jealous.
I am not jealous of people who look filtered 24/7.
translation.zh:
‎我可不会嫉妒这种
‎7天24小时都自带滤镜的人

translation.en: [under breath] I don't know! Kinda sounds like you're jealous to me!
-[woman] Come on, Cassie, let's go! -[laughing] Okay, one second!
translation.zh:
‎-快点 凯茜 我们走！
‎-好的 等一下

translation.en: You know, you're different when you're with them.
translation.zh:
‎你知道吗 跟他们在一起时
‎你像变了个人似的

translation.en: [Cassie] I'm what?
It's like you think you aren't worth anything if you aren't seen.
translation.zh:
‎就好像如果不被人看到
‎你就没有任何价值似的

translation.en: Well, at least I'm out making friends, and I'm not hiding at my desk.
translation.zh: ‎你猜怎么着 至少我有跑出来交朋友 ‎而不是躲在自己桌子后面

translation.en: Because I think that there is more to life than partying
translation.zh:
‎因为我认为人生的意义
‎不仅仅是吃喝玩乐

translation.en: or knowing all the names of bartenders in town.
translation.zh: ‎或是记住全镇每个酒保的名字

translation.en: Here we go! My life isn't as important because it's social.
translation.zh:
‎又来了 我的人生没那么重要
‎因为我有社交

translation.en: Just because I'm not one of your science friends
translation.zh: ‎我不是你那些搞科学的朋友

translation.en: doesn't mean I don't work hard.
-I didn't say that! -But you meant it!
translation.zh:
‎-我没这么说
‎-你就是这个意思！

translation.en: I see how you only pretend to be interested
translation.zh:
‎我看得出来每当我告诉你
‎我策划了什么活动时

translation.en: when I tell you about some event I planned
or your offhanded comments about how I'm never home.
translation.zh:
‎你老是假装不经意地抱怨
‎我总不在家什么的

translation.en: Like you don't pretend to understand my life?
translation.zh:
‎说得好像你就不假装
‎你理解我的生活？

translation.en: Tell me what I do.
You work at the museum.
But what do I do there?
I don't know. I don't understand that stuff.
translation.zh: ‎我哪知道？我又不懂你那些玩意！

translation.en: And I don't understand your stuff.
[scoffs, chuckles wryly] Classic.
We never hang out anymore.
Just the two of us.
We're busy. We'll just have to get better at making time for each other.
translation.zh:
‎我们都忙啊 ‎我们要学一下
‎该怎么样留出时间给对方

translation.en: I don't know, Cassie. I don't think being friends should feel like work.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 凯茜 我… ‎我认为做朋友不该感觉像工作一样累

translation.en: I don't think it does, Lisa.
But I can tell from your face that you do.
translation.zh: ‎但我能从你脸上看出 你有这种感觉

translation.en: It's fine.
I don't wanna stay best friends out of habit anyway.
translation.zh:
‎反正我也不想
‎因为习惯才保持好朋友的关系

translation.en: I'm a habit?
Th-- That's it? You're just gonna say something like that and walk away?
translation.zh:
‎就这样？你打算撂下这种话
‎然后拍拍屁股走掉？

translation.en: Maybe it's time we both admit that we've outgrown each other.
translation.zh:
‎也许是时候承认我们俩渐行渐远
‎已经不适合彼此了

translation.en: -[Cassie] Who's ready to go to Roddy's? -[friends cheering]
[Cassie laughs] Let's do it. Sorry about that, guys.
translation.zh: ‎我们走吧 刚才的事很抱歉 各位

translation.en: Mona's missing her smile.
Here's one.
Put this here.
That'll fix it.
Oh no.
No, no, no, no.
No. No, no, no.
So stupid.
[sighs] So stupid.
Uh, hi.
Excuse me?
Did that go viral?
Oh, you're awake!
Welcome. Welcome.
No, no, don't worry. No, it's research. It's not gone viral.
translation.zh:
‎不 别担心 我只是研究一下
‎没有在网上传开

translation.en: I'm Val. I'll be your handler through this transition.
translation.zh:
‎我叫瓦尔
‎我是你这个过渡期的负责人

translation.en: Well, it's nice to finally meet you, Miss Cassandra Adeline Garcia.
translation.zh:
‎很高兴能终于见到你本人
‎卡珊德拉·阿德琳·加西亚小姐

translation.en: Now, according to my notes, you go by Cassie. You're 25--
translation.zh:
‎根据我这边的记录
‎大家一般管你叫凯茜 ‎-今年25岁…
‎-还差个几天

translation.en: -In a few days. -Huh?
Parents, Howie and Sofia, divorced.
translation.zh: ‎父母是霍伊和索菲娅 离异

translation.en: Born May 31st, died May 25th.
Died?
Oh, I'm sorry. Died May 26th.
Who… who are you?
I'm Val. Otherwise known as your temporary guardian angel.
translation.zh: ‎我是瓦尔呀 ‎也可以说 我是你的临时守护天使

translation.en: You don't look like a guardian angel. Shouldn't you have a halo?
translation.zh:
‎你看起来不像守护天使啊
‎你不应该顶个光环吗？

translation.en: -Oh, special occasions only. -Okay, what about wings?
translation.zh:
‎-光环是专为特殊场合准备的
‎-那翅膀呢？

translation.en: Oh, no, we phased those out years ago.
translation.zh: ‎没有 那玩意老早就已经被淘汰掉了

translation.en: Okay. This… this can't really be happening.
I was… I was just with my friends.
translation.zh: ‎我刚才还跟我朋友们在一起呢

translation.en: Oh! I know! I… I had… I had champagne with gold flakes in it,
translation.zh:
‎我知道了！
‎我喝了里面有金箔片的香槟

translation.en: and sometimes it makes you hallucinate. [laughs] I'm hallucinating.
translation.zh:
‎有时候那会让人产生幻觉
‎我现在是产生幻觉了

translation.en: [laughs] No. This isn't a hallucination. Oh, this… this part's always hard.
translation.zh:
‎不 这不是幻觉
‎这部分向来都这么艰难

translation.en: How can I put this?
Yeah, um, you died.
-Stop saying that! -I mean, you saw it yourself, so--
translation.zh:
‎-别再提这个字了！
‎-你亲眼见到的 所以…

translation.en: -I died in the bathroom? -Yeah.
Oh! Oh, this keeps getting worse!
[splutters] Look, it's going to be okay.
translation.zh: ‎听我说 一切都会没事的

translation.en: And the good news is that the worst is over now that you're d--
translation.zh:
‎好消息是
‎最坏的部分都已经过去了 你人死…

translation.en: No longer living.
You don't have to deal with all of those human annoyances,
translation.zh:
‎你就不用再对付那些
‎做人时候的烦心事了

translation.en: you know, like heartbreak or PMS.
translation.zh: ‎你懂的 比如心碎啊 痛经啊什么的

translation.en: Just think of the afterlife as one long spa day.
translation.zh:
‎你就把身后的经历想成
‎一个漫长的水疗日就对了

translation.en: And if you're one of the lucky ones, it could last for an eternity.
translation.zh:
‎而且如果你是幸运儿的话
‎这天就会永远地持续下去

translation.en: So, I went up?
-[inhales] Well-- -Is this down? I went down?
translation.zh:
‎-这个嘛…
‎-这里是下面？我下去了？

translation.en: You're in the middle. We call this the In-Between.
translation.zh: ‎你现在在中间 我们管这里叫中间界

translation.en: So like general admission?
Sure. This is your personal waiting room. It's your safe space.
translation.zh:
‎可以吧 这里是你的私人等候室
‎是你的安全区

translation.en: It's designed specifically to your taste
translation.zh: ‎这里是专门根据你个人品味来设计的

translation.en: to make your transition more… [inhales] …comfortable.
translation.zh: ‎为了让你的过渡来得更加舒适

translation.en: So everyone who dies is in the In-Between?
translation.zh: ‎就是说 每个人死后都会来中间界？

translation.en: Oh no. No, no, no. Maybe I should give you a pamphlet.
translation.zh: ‎噢 不 不是的 ‎也许我应该给你本册子看看

translation.en: No, no! I don't need a pamphlet. Just tell me.
translation.zh:
‎不 我不要看什么册子
‎你直接告诉我就行

translation.en: It can't be crazier than anything that's happening.
translation.zh:
‎因为没什么能比
‎现在发生的这些更疯狂了

translation.en: Well, the In-Between is for those who have unfinished business back on Earth,
translation.zh:
‎是这样的 中间界是给那些
‎在人间还有未尽之事的人准备的

translation.en: like yourself.
What unfinished business?
Well, you get a second chance to make things right
translation.zh:
‎你将获得第二次机会
‎能去找一张选定名单上的人

translation.en: with a select list of people,
you know, and if you succeed, you get sent to the Above.
translation.zh: ‎如果你成功了 你就会被送到上面去

translation.en: And if you don't, well, you know, it's…
translation.zh: ‎但如果没成功 你懂的 那就…

translation.en: it's just, it's… Yeah, it's, you know… [whistles]
-It's… Yeah. -It…
Yeah.
But I thought it was for murderers and people who don't like Beyoncé.
translation.zh:
‎我还以为那是给杀人犯
‎和不喜欢碧昂丝的人准备的

translation.en: -I'm a proud member of the Beyhive. -[chuckles] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-我绝对是碧昂丝的忠实粉丝
‎-是啊

translation.en: No, no, it's a tiered system. Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎不 这是一个分级的系统 嗯

translation.en: You want the Above. Trust me.
translation.zh: ‎最好还是去上面 相信我

translation.en: You ready to meet your list?
translation.zh: ‎准备好见你名单上的人了没？

translation.en: Now? No. I'm not ready! Oh!
That was like riding a roller coaster backwards and blindfolded.
translation.zh:
‎这感觉就像是蒙着眼罩
‎倒着坐过山车一样

translation.en: [chuckles] You get used to it.
Wait, we're at my dad's house.
translation.zh: ‎等等 我们这是在我爸家

translation.en: Hey, Dad!
Hey.
Hey!
[Cassie] Why isn't he responding?
He can't see or hear you.
translation.zh: ‎他看不见你 也听不见你

translation.en: No one can.
What? No, that can't be right.
Well, we can't risk scaring people on Earth.
translation.zh:
‎我们可不能冒这个险
‎会吓到人间的人的

translation.en: They're so fragile.
[Cassie] Hello? Dad?
It's me! It's Cassie, your favorite and only child.
translation.zh:
‎是我呀 凯茜
‎你最爱的 也是唯一的孩子

translation.en: He never let me eat junk food.
What is goin' on?
And why is this house such a mess?
translation.zh: ‎还有为什么房子里这么乱？这…

translation.en: This… this is not like him.
translation.zh: ‎还有为什么房子里这么乱？这… ‎这一点也不像他啊

translation.en: He's Downward Dad. He's all about healthy living,
translation.zh:
‎他可是“下犬爹”啊
‎健康生活对他来说就是一切

translation.en: and he even makes his own kombucha.
How long have I been gone?
Val, how long?
-A year. -A year?
It feels like a day.
Well, time works differently up there.
[sighs] Maybe I should've taken a pamphlet.
translation.zh: ‎也许我是应该拿本册子看的

translation.en: [Cassie] The last time he was like this was when my mom left.
translation.zh:
‎他上回这副模样
‎还是我妈离开的时候

translation.en: After you passed,
he gave up.
When was the last time you saw him?
translation.zh: ‎你最后一次见他是什么时候？

translation.en: I… I don't know. I…
I kept meaning to visit, but there were all these events.
translation.zh:
‎我一直打算去看他
‎但总有这样那样的活动要弄

translation.en: I liked one of his posts. Does that count?
translation.zh: ‎我赞过一个他发的东西 能算吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
Is that why he's on my list?
He's in mourning.
He needs a reason to feel hopeful again.
translation.zh: ‎他需要一个重获希望的理由

translation.en: Tell me what I should do.
You should see the rest of your list.
translation.zh: ‎你应该先去看看名单上的其他人

translation.en: Lisa? Really, Val? No. Pass. Hard pass.
translation.zh:
‎丽莎？真的 瓦尔？
‎不行 不干 坚决不干

translation.en: There is no hard pass. There isn't even a regular pass.
translation.zh:
‎哪来什么“坚决不干”
‎根本没有“不干”这回事

translation.en: What about if I kill it with my dad? Not kill kill. You know what I mean.
translation.zh:
‎要是我在我爸那边
‎就能把这件事办成呢？

translation.en: Can we pretend Lisa isn't on the list?
translation.zh: ‎我们就假装丽莎不在名单上吧

translation.en: Why are you so afraid of seeing your best friend again?
translation.zh:
‎你为什么这么害怕
‎再见到自己的好朋友？

translation.en: -My former BFF, and I'm not. -Mm.
translation.zh: ‎是我以前的好朋友 而且我不怕

translation.en: [Cassie] There's too much history between us.
translation.zh: ‎只是我俩之间的历史太复杂了

translation.en: Besides, I don't know if I want to. Some friendships just end, you know?
translation.zh: ‎而且 我还不知道我到底想不想 ‎有些友谊就是戛然而止的

translation.en: Shouldn't I have a say in who's on my list?
translation.zh: ‎难道我没权决定名单上有谁吗？

translation.en: This is my afterlife we're talking about.
[inhales sharply] She's been hiding in her work ever since you left.
translation.zh: ‎自从你离开后 她就一直躲在工作里

translation.en: Last one out. It's the same every day.
translation.zh: ‎最后一个下班 每天都是这样

translation.en: How about we skip Lisa and move to the next name?
translation.zh:
‎要不我们暂时跳过丽莎
‎先去拜访下一个名字？

translation.en: -I'll take it. No complaints. Pinky swear. -No. I don't do that.
translation.zh: ‎让我一次 我就不抱怨了 拉钩钩 ‎别 我可不做这种事

translation.en: But I will show you who's next on your list.
translation.zh:
‎但我可以让你看看
‎你名单上下一个是谁

translation.en: Please be Koop. Please be Koop. Please be Koop.
How are you doing that?
Oh, you can do it too. It's all part of your basic angel package.
translation.zh:
‎你也可以啊
‎这是基础天使套件中的一部分

translation.en: You just focus on where you want to go, give a little snap or a nod.
translation.zh: ‎只要专心想着你要去的地方 ‎然后打个响指或者点个头

translation.en: One angel I know likes to wink.
Just make it your own. And then you're there.
translation.zh: ‎自己挑招牌动作 然后你就到了

translation.en: So, I can go anywhere?
Oh, no, not anywhere.
Your teleporting is limited to places that you're needed only.
translation.zh:
‎你的传送能力只能用在
‎有人需要你的地方

translation.en: No detours.
-Got it. -Right. Now, back to the list.
translation.zh:
‎-明白了
‎-嗯 好嘞 继续我们的名单

translation.en: -Ugh. I don't know if I'm ready for more. -[woman] Morgan, slow down!
translation.zh: ‎我不知道我有没有准备好继续啊 ‎摩根 慢一点！

translation.en: -Wait for Mommy! -[Morgan giggles]
[in English] Hi, you're so fast. [kisses] Oh.
-That's-- -[Val] Your mother.
I haven't called her that since the day she moved out.
translation.zh:
‎自她从家里搬出去后
‎我就再也没这么叫过她

translation.en: -She's Sofia to me. -[Sofia speaks indistinctly]
[Cassie] Is that my half sister?
I've never met her.
So, you do have some unfinished business, then.
translation.zh: ‎看来你还真有不少未尽之事 对吧

translation.en: Can we go now, please?
[scoffs] It's only three names.
Not easy ones.
[tuts] Oh, you can do this, Cassie.
translation.zh: ‎你能行的 凯茜 我相信你

translation.en: -I believe in you. -That makes one of us.
translation.zh: ‎你能行的 凯茜 我相信你 ‎也就只有你信了

translation.en: You have the five Earth days leading up to your birthday to complete this list.
translation.zh:
‎你将有五天人间的时间
‎赶在你生日前完成这个名单

translation.en: Wait, five days?
Sure. Why not? Hey, you know what? Why don't we make it two days?
translation.zh: ‎好呀 干嘛不呢？ ‎你猜怎么着？不如就给我两天吧

translation.en: Or better yet, we can just cram it all into one!
Well, just think of it as Cassie-palooza, the afterlife edition.
translation.zh: ‎你就把这当作是凯茜狂欢周 ‎身后版

translation.en: It's… it's like Cassie…
No. No, you're right. Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎嗯 你说得对 是不好

translation.en: Okay, right.
Right, so a name will disappear
translation.zh: ‎是这样的 每当你了结一件未尽之事

translation.en: each time it's deemed that you have closure.
How am I supposed to do this if I can't communicate?
translation.zh:
‎可我要怎么了结啊？
‎我连交流都没办法

translation.en: Well, you'll find a way.
Can I text? Tweet? TikTok?
translation.zh: ‎我能发信息吗？发推特？发抖音？

translation.en: No, no, and definitely negatory.
Do I at least get cool superpowers, like mind control or something?
translation.zh:
‎至少能给我些很酷的超能力吧？
‎比如精神控制什么的？

translation.en: It's guardian-angel level only.
translation.zh: ‎你只有守护天使级别的能力

translation.en: This is about you learning to really connect with the people closest to you.
translation.zh:
‎这就是为了让你学会
‎如何真正地与跟你最亲近的人交流

translation.en: Yeah, and what if I can't?
Well, I'll be here if you need me.
translation.zh: ‎你有需要的话 随时找我啊

translation.en: Except between noon and 4:00. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎好吧 除了正午到四点钟之外

translation.en: [chuckling] I'm kidding. It's a joke.
Look, I'm always going to be here for you.
translation.zh: ‎听着 我会一直在你身边帮你

translation.en: Now, is there anything else before go time?
translation.zh:
‎在正式开始前
‎还有什么别的问题吗？

translation.en: Well,
actually, I, um…
I was wondering--
Yeah, yeah. I know what you're thinking.
And, uh, yes,
you do get a wardrobe change.
Yeah, yeah. You just close your eyes and envision what you want to wear.
translation.zh:
‎你只需要闭上双眼
‎想象自己想要穿成的样子就行

translation.en: But just so you know, you only get one wardrobe change a day,
translation.zh:
‎但有一点要说清楚
‎你每天只能换一套衣服

translation.en: so make it count.
-It's so sparkly. -[rock music fades]
I think this might be my favorite part about being here.
translation.zh:
‎我想这可能是我来这里后
‎最喜欢的一点了

translation.en: I guess it really is time.
Somebody call Marie Kondo because joy is not sparking here.
translation.zh:
‎谁赶紧给近藤麻理惠打个电话 ‎因为这里根本没有
‎能让人怦然心动的东西

translation.en: Lisa first.
Great.
Guess I'm ripping the Band-Aid off.
Okay.
What would Val do?
-I did it. -[whimsical music playing]
What the gamer geek?
Who are you, and what did you do to my room?
translation.zh: ‎你谁啊？你在我房间里做什么？

translation.en: Hey.
Oh, the cute neighbor still lives here. Are you two in love yet?
translation.zh: ‎这个帅邻居还住在这里啊 ‎你俩已经坠入爱河了吗？

translation.en: -Hey, you. -Hey. Morning.
-Are you just getting home now? -Yeah.
I'm, uh, in the process of scoring this game
about, uh, post-apocalyptic, motorcycle-riding zombie Vikings.
translation.zh:
‎讲的是世界末日后
‎一帮骑摩托车的维京人僵尸的

translation.en: It sounds lame now I'm saying it out loud, but it's pretty dope
translation.zh: ‎我这么说出来 听着好像挺挫的 ‎但实际上还是蛮牛的

translation.en: if post-apocalyptic, motorcycle-riding zombie Vikings are your thing.
translation.zh:
‎前提是你喜欢世界末日后
‎骑摩托车的维京人僵尸

translation.en: You're heading to work early. Oh, no watch.
translation.zh: ‎你这么早就去上班啊 没手表

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, I, um…
I like getting to work before everybody else, you know? The calm is… is, um--
translation.zh:
‎我喜欢赶在其他人之前到
‎那份平静很…

translation.en: Calming.
-Exactly. -Yeah.
-You get it. -Yeah, I do.
-[Max chuckles] -Yeah.
Cool, well, hopefully one day, when our schedules can align,
translation.zh: ‎好的 希望哪天我俩的时间能对上

translation.en: um, we can properly hang out? Me and you?
-Yeah. -Yeah?
-Yeah, okay. Okay. Yes, yes. -Yeah.
-Yeah, I would… I would like that. -Brilliant.
-Okay, well, um, I'm gonna go. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-嗯 那么 我得走了
‎-嗯

translation.en: -Cool. Well, have a good day. -Thank you. You too.
translation.zh:
‎-祝你今天愉快
‎-谢谢 也祝你愉快

translation.en: -Good seeing you. Bye. -Bye.
translation.zh:
‎-很高兴见到你 再见
‎-再见

translation.en: It's been a year, and you still haven't gone out with him?
translation.zh:
‎都已经过去了整整一年
‎你还没跟他出去约会过？

translation.en: It is a good thing I'm back.
So the way we ended things… Talk about bad timing!
translation.zh: ‎我们绝交的那件事 ‎时间还真是凑得不巧呐

translation.en: Are you still mad at me?
I know I should still be mad at you, but it doesn't feel right anymore.
translation.zh: ‎我知道我应该还在生你的气 ‎但事到如今还这样就不太好了

translation.en: -When did this place open? -[Lisa laughs]
Ugh! I hate being so out of touch!
Morning, Emme. How are you?
translation.zh: ‎早上好 艾米 你好吗？

translation.en: Hi. I've got your order waiting.
translation.zh: ‎嗨 我已经把你的单准备好了

translation.en: Oh my-- Emme, you spoil me.
translation.zh: ‎我的天 艾米 你要把我宠坏了

translation.en: Who is Emme? I know all your friends, and I don't know her.
translation.zh: ‎这个艾米是谁啊？ ‎你的朋友我都认识 从没听过她

translation.en: -[Lisa] Okay. -Ta-da!
Oh. Ooh. What is that smell?
I'm working on a new brownie recipe. They're just out of the oven. Wanna try?
translation.zh: ‎我正在研究一个新的布朗尼配方 ‎刚刚新鲜出炉 想试试吗？

translation.en: I will always be your guinea pig.
translation.zh: ‎我愿意做你一辈子的小白鼠

translation.en: So, um, how has everything been? Are you feeling a little bit more settled?
translation.zh:
‎那么 最近怎么样啊？
‎有没有感觉稍微适应一些？

translation.en: [Emme] Things are good.
Haven't seen much of the town yet. I should probably get out more.
translation.zh:
‎还没怎么在城里逛过呢
‎我应该多出去玩玩

translation.en: Baked goods aren't the best conversationalists.
translation.zh: ‎烘焙食品并不是一个有趣的话题

translation.en: Well, neither are bones.
I am thinking of throwing a one-year anniversary party for the shop.
translation.zh:
‎我在考虑要不要给我们店
‎办一场周年庆派对

translation.en: That would be so cool.
Careful. It's hot.
-Oh! -[Lisa] Okay.
I miss brownies. Why couldn't I have had death by chocolate?
translation.zh: ‎我好怀念布朗尼啊 ‎为什么我就不能被巧克力噎死呢？

translation.en: Wow. Wow. I mean, this is… this is incredible.
Oh, it's made with love. And agave.
translation.zh: ‎我在里面加了爱 还有龙舌兰糖浆

translation.en: I need to go to work, but thank you. I'll see you later, okay?
translation.zh: ‎我得去上班了 谢谢你 我们回头见

translation.en: -Ciao for now. -Bye!
Bye.
So, how's your list coming along?
The quiet type, huh?
So…
this is your life now.
Okay.
-You beat me to work. Again. -[gasps, exhales]
Oh, jumpy.
Are you on something?
Next time, bring enough for the whole class! [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎下回多带点 要够全班分享的！

translation.en: Yeah.
-What do you want, Raj? -[Raj] Did you hear?
translation.zh:
‎-你想干嘛 拉杰？
‎-你听说了吗？

translation.en: Uh, hear what?
Dr. Redding's leading a dig at Hell's Creek this summer,
translation.zh:
‎雷丁博士今年夏天
‎要在地狱溪组织一场挖掘

translation.en: and she's looking for a junior field researcher to join.
translation.zh:
‎她正在找一个初级实地研究员
‎加入她的团队

translation.en: Wait, Dr. Marion Redding? Are you messing with me?
translation.zh:
‎等等 玛丽恩·雷丁博士？
‎你是逗我玩吗？

translation.en: Not only that, the GOAT herself is coming into the office
translation.zh: ‎不仅如此 她本尊会亲自出马 ‎到我们办公室来进行面试

translation.en: to hold interviews. I'm about to go sign up over at the…
translation.zh: ‎到我们办公室来进行面试 ‎我正要去报名呢 报名表就在…

translation.en: break room.
[Cassie] A sign-up sheet.
How retro. But I dig it.
What are you waiting for? Just write your name.
translation.zh: ‎你还在等什么呐？把你名字写上啊

translation.en: L-I--
-[Raj] Pretty competitive, huh? -[groans]
And she's only picking one person.
I think we all know who that'll be.
translation.zh: ‎我想我们都知道那个人会是谁

translation.en: R-A-J. B-R-I-T-T-O.
[winces] Only four spots left.
Don't listen. He's trying to psych you out in the lamest way possible.
translation.zh: ‎别听他的 他只是想唬住你 ‎而且还是这种最最挫的方式

translation.en: I'm gonna sign up later.
I have a lot of work to do, so I can't really think about this kind of thing right now.
translation.zh:
‎我还有很多事要做
‎所以我现在没时间想这件事

translation.en: Sure.
You're giving up?
In the bag, Britto.
What's so important?
I left a farmer in his barn-themed waiting room for you. Are you okay?
translation.zh:
‎我把一个农民撂在了
‎他谷仓主题的等候室里 ‎先跑来找你了 你没事吧？

translation.en: It… it's Lisa. She's so stubborn.
You know, I don't think this is gonna work.
She doesn't seem to miss me. There's no trace of me anywhere.
translation.zh:
‎她好像一点也不想我
‎哪里都没有我的痕迹

translation.en: Oh, and get this. I've been replaced by this roommate who is full-on dark web.
translation.zh:
‎哦 对了 我已经被一个
‎整天泡在暗网上的室友取代了

translation.en: -Why aren't you saying anything? -You're saying enough for the both of us.
translation.zh: ‎你怎么一句话也不说？ ‎你已经把我们俩的话都说了

translation.en: Look, I know going back is hard,
translation.zh: ‎听我说 我明白回去是很艰难的

translation.en: but you aren't forgotten.
Oh, I don't know about that.
Well, maybe if we cut out all the "I"s and "me"s and look harder,
translation.zh: ‎或许当我们把这些话里的“我”都去掉 ‎更仔细地寻找一番

translation.en: you'll find that she actually does need you.
translation.zh: ‎你就会发觉 她其实是很需要你的

translation.en: Why are you sleeping?
There is a whole world out there, and you are missing it.
translation.zh: ‎外头这么精彩的世界 全被你错过了

translation.en: Lisa. Lisa, wake up.
I need to talk to you.
Lisa, wake up!
Wake up! Wake up! Wake up!
Wake up! Wake up!
Come on, Val. This isn't fair.
translation.zh: ‎拜托 瓦尔 这不公平

translation.en: How am I supposed to do this if my best friend can't see or hear me?
translation.zh: ‎要是我的好朋友看不见也听不见我 ‎我要怎么才能了结啊？

translation.en: I need a little help here, please!
translation.zh: ‎我需要一点帮助 求你了！

translation.en: [Lisa] Piper, turn down your game.
Trying to sleep.
-Why won't you let me sleep? -[humming continues]
-What's happening? -[splutters] I don't know.
Oh, but it worked!
You can't be… you can't be here. No.
Oh, you can see me?
This is a dream. Maybe a nightmare. Work… work… work has been stressful.
translation.zh:
‎这是一场梦 也许是做噩梦了
‎最近工作压力大

translation.en: You can hear me too?
[gasps] This isn't supposed to be happening.
This is awesome, and crazy, but mostly awesome.
translation.zh:
‎真是棒极了 也很疯狂
‎但最主要是棒极了

translation.en: You aren't here. Nope. You died.
translation.zh: ‎你没在这里 不 你已经死了

translation.en: Yeah, that sucked.
I don't believe in whatever you are.
translation.zh: ‎无论你是什么鬼东西 我都不信

translation.en: I'm nothing scary! I'm like a junior guardian angel.
translation.zh:
‎我不是可怕的东西 ‎我是个初级守护天使
‎好吧 还不是正式的

translation.en: Well, not officially. I don't know if that's a thing,
translation.zh:
‎我是个初级守护天使
‎好吧 还不是正式的 ‎虽然我不知道有没有这回事
‎但我是这么定位的

translation.en: but that's how I make sense of it. Titles aren't important right now.
translation.zh:
‎虽然我不知道有没有这回事
‎但我是这么定位的 ‎总之头衔不是现在的重点

translation.en: I'll be back.
Not… not in an ominous way! In a good way.
translation.zh: ‎不是阴魂不散的那种！是很好的那种

translation.en: It's really nice to be able to talk to you again.
translation.zh: ‎能再跟你说上话真是太好了

translation.en: [whispering] Please be gone. Please be…
Sorry for interrupting, but you'll never believe what happened. Lisa--
translation.zh:
‎很抱歉打扰你 ‎但你绝对不会相信
‎刚才发生了什么 丽莎…

translation.en: Can see and hear you. Yep. Yep. Everyone knows. You're trending.
translation.zh:
‎能看见和听见你 对
‎大家都知道了 你上了热门榜

translation.en: I've heard rumors of this, but I've never experienced it.
translation.zh:
‎我听说过这方面的传言
‎但从来没有体验过

translation.en: Making contact used to be fairly common,
translation.zh: ‎与活人接触在以前是挺常见的

translation.en: but now, with all the distractions, it's practically non-existent.
translation.zh: ‎可如今 有这么多分散注意力的东西 ‎基本上已经见不着了

translation.en: Well, it happened.
You never forget the first time your friend looks at you in sheer terror.
translation.zh:
‎你永远也忘不了第一次见到
‎你的朋友极度恐惧地看着你的样子

translation.en: Everyone's staring at me like I'm a unicorn.
translation.zh:
‎所有人都在盯着我
‎好像我是独角兽似的

translation.en: This is the Angels' Den. It's the central command of the In-Between.
translation.zh:
‎这里是天使之巢
‎是中间界的中央指挥部

translation.en: Unicorns are in a different area.
A book? Really?
Yes. Don't you just love books?
Okay.
Mm. Here.
translation.zh: ‎（你能看到我 怎么办？） ‎这里

translation.en: Yep, yep, yep. There we are.
Okay. It's quite rare.
"Said In-Betweener can only affect the physical world
translation.zh: ‎“只有在能被对方看见时 ‎该中间界者才能影响实体世界”

translation.en: once visible to subject."
translation.zh: ‎该中间界者才能影响实体世界”

translation.en: "It mainly happens in cases
where the people involved were extraordinarily connected."
translation.zh: ‎说明当事人之间的关系非常紧密”

translation.en: "Some call it soul mates or kindred spirits."
translation.zh: ‎“有人称之为灵魂伴侣或是志趣相投”

translation.en: So,
it might be a fluke in the system,
or it's just you and Lisa.
-We should test it. -Okay.
Go on, then. Start talking to someone. Let's see what happens.
translation.zh:
‎-去吧 找个人说话 看看会怎么样
‎-好的

translation.en: Okay. Hey! What's up?
Go on.
Hey, guys. How's it goin'?
Hello?
Hey, ladies! Ooh! I like your shoes. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎两位女士！我好喜欢你们的鞋子

translation.en: -[women speaking indistinctly] -No? Nothing?
Okay. No one's responding.
I'm usually the center of the party, not on the sidelines. This feels odd.
translation.zh:
‎我通常都是派对的中心
‎不是在场边作陪衬 ‎这感觉可真奇怪

translation.en: You seem strangely cheerful for someone trying to solve a fluke in the system.
translation.zh: ‎作为一个想办法解决系统问题的人 ‎你看上去怎么好像还挺愉快的啊

translation.en: There's just so much energy.
Isn't it beautiful?
You know the saying "angel on your shoulder"?
translation.zh: ‎你知道“肩膀上的天使”这个说法吧？

translation.en: That's who I want to be.
A guardian angel who's there through all of these stages of life.
translation.zh:
‎一个在人生中每个阶段
‎都帮助人的守护天使

translation.en: Not just at the end.
So why don't you? It's not my decision to make.
translation.zh:
‎-那你为什么不去做呢？
‎-这个决定不由我

translation.en: Is this dog barking at me?
[Val] Oh, he can see you!
Yeah. Animals are more open to the spiritual world. Some kids are too.
translation.zh:
‎动物对灵魂世界的感知更强
‎有些孩子也是

translation.en: No, poppet, we're working. Go back to your owner.
translation.zh:
‎别这样 亲爱的 我们在工作呢
‎回到你主人那儿去

translation.en: [Val] Go on.
So we can talk to animals?
Not we. I can. Yeah, it's above your power grade.
translation.zh:
‎不是我们 是我能
‎不好意思 这在你的能力之上

translation.en: -Oh. -Sorry.
Right, so nothing from strangers.
translation.zh: ‎好了 就是说陌生人没回应

translation.en: -Nope. -That's good, actually. Less cleanup.
translation.zh: ‎其实这样最好 修复更简单

translation.en: We should try someone close to you.
translation.zh: ‎我们应该找个与你亲密的人试试

translation.en: Not much to report since I talked to you last.
translation.zh:
‎自从上次找你聊完之后
‎没什么大变化好说的

translation.en: Is he trying to talk to me?
I stopped seeing that woman I told you about, Maria.
translation.zh: ‎我已经不再见那个女的了 ‎上次跟你提过的玛利亚

translation.en: She's nice. I'm just not ready yet.
translation.zh: ‎她人很好 只是我还没准备好

translation.en: He's been doing this since you left. Brings him comfort.
translation.zh: ‎自从你离开后 他就一直这样 ‎能给他带来一些慰藉

translation.en: This whole room does.
The yoga studio's doing fine.
I'm still more focused on running it than teaching.
translation.zh: ‎我依旧把精力放在管理上 多过教学

translation.en: There's been requests for me to teach my sunrise class again. I probably should.
translation.zh:
‎有不少人要求我重新教日出课
‎我可能应该教吧

translation.en: I just feel so guilty going on like normal when you can't.
translation.zh: ‎我感到很内疚 ‎我能继续过正常的生活 而你却不能

translation.en: I miss you, kiddo.
All I ever wanted was to protect you, and I couldn't even do that.
translation.zh:
‎我只是想是保护你而已
‎可我连这也没做到

translation.en: Oh, Dad, but you did.
Remember that song I used to sing to you when you were little?
translation.zh: ‎记得小时候我唱给你的那首歌吗？

translation.en: I don't remember.
Try. Maybe I will.
That was a long time ago.
I'm sorry for not visiting much.
translation.zh: ‎对不起 我没怎么来看你

translation.en: For making fun of your Downward Dad posts.
I'm gonna let you know I'm okay.
Somehow.
We can try your mum.
I'm not ready for her yet.
I'm going back to Lisa. I wanna fix this.
translation.zh: ‎我要回去找丽莎 我想把这事解决了

translation.en: It'll be day two, so make it count.
translation.zh: ‎那要第二天了 所以你要好好把握

translation.en: [whispering] I'm clearly just having a stroke.
Wait, Lisa, wait!
-You felt that too? -[whispering] This isn't happening.
Let me explain, okay? Or at least try.
translation.zh: ‎听我解释 好吗？至少让我试试

translation.en: Uh, there's this list. And for me to get to the big party in the sky--
translation.zh:
‎这里有张名单
‎为了能让我有资格去天上的大派对…

translation.en: [whispering] Go away.
A door? Really?
[loudly] Oh, come on!
Let's analyze some fossils. Whoo!
I'm not gonna hurt you. I just wanna talk.
translation.zh: ‎我不会伤害你的 我只是想谈谈

translation.en: Okay. If you don't wanna talk right now, then we don't have to. Fine.
translation.zh:
‎如果你现在不想谈的话
‎我也不会逼你 ‎没事 但在我们谈之前
‎我是哪儿也不会去的

translation.en: But I'm not going anywhere until we do.
translation.zh:
‎没事 但在我们谈之前
‎我是哪儿也不会去的

translation.en: [Lisa] No, no. I'm just working too hard.
Because I'm working hard, it could cause the visions.
translation.zh: ‎因为工作得太累 才造成幻视的

translation.en: Okay. I'm sick! So sick. I'm sick.
translation.zh: ‎好吗？我生病了！病得不轻 我病了

translation.en: -Otherwise, it doesn't make sense. -Maybe not, but it's happening.
translation.zh: ‎不然这就根本讲不通了 ‎也许是讲不通 但事情就是这样了

translation.en: Don't be shy. Come and try.
Why wait till it's too late?
Uh-oh. You look like you could do with a caramel mocha pretzel bite.
translation.zh:
‎你看起来正需要来一块
‎焦糖摩卡咸脆饼

translation.en: [sighs] Okay.
Or two.
Let's get you inside.
This place has so much potential, but what is with all the doilies?
translation.zh:
‎这地方潜力无限大
‎可为什么要搞这么多小桌布啊？

translation.en: Would you like a calming tea or…
[whispering] No. I… I don't need calming.
I need an exorcist.
[scoffs] Well, I can't help you with that.
[Lisa] Okay. So, um,
this is the one-year anniversary of my best friend's death.
translation.zh: ‎今天是我好朋友死亡一周年的纪念日

translation.en: -I think it's making me a little crazy. -Your flatmate, the one you told me about?
translation.zh: ‎我想我要因为这个发疯了 ‎就是你跟我说过的那个室友？

translation.en: -You told her about me? -Yeah, Cassie.
translation.zh:
‎-你把我的事告诉她了？
‎-对 凯茜

translation.en: This is gonna sound really weird, but, um,
translation.zh: ‎接下来这番话听起来会很奇怪 但…

translation.en: she talks to me, and… [breathes heavily]
…I can see her.
That doesn't sound weird at all. She was your best mate. She's part of you.
translation.zh:
‎这听起来一点也不奇怪 ‎她曾是你最要好的伙伴
‎她是你的一部分

translation.en: -Thank you for letting me lay this on you. -[Emme laughs]
I just… I really, really needed to talk to someone.
Is she here now?
-Boo! -Uh-huh.
-Yeah. Yeah. She, uh… -[Emme] Oh. …she thinks your store needs a makeover.
translation.zh: ‎是的 她认为你的店需要装修一下

translation.en: Oh! Well, I'm open to anything that will encourage people to hang out.
translation.zh:
‎只要能吸引顾客进来
‎我什么建议都愿意听

translation.en: See? She agrees with me. I'm starting to like this Emme.
translation.zh:
‎看到没？她同意我的看法
‎我开始喜欢这个艾米了

translation.en: [Emme] Look, everyone deals with grief in their own way.
translation.zh: ‎每个人都有自己面对悲痛的方法

translation.en: -It's a compliment when they come back. -This doesn't feel like a compliment.
translation.zh: ‎他们回来 说明你好啊 ‎这感觉可并不好啊

translation.en: -Would your friend like an eclair? -Don't… don't encourage her, please.
translation.zh:
‎-你的朋友要不要来个奶油卷？
‎-别鼓励她 拜托

translation.en: Thank you for understanding, Emme. Thank you. I just…
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你的理解 艾米 我只是…

translation.en: I think that I need to go and be by myself for a while. I'm just gonna do that.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得我需要一个人静一静 ‎我这就去

translation.en: Who turns down a free eclair? I can't eat, and I'd still take it.
translation.zh: ‎谁会拒绝免费的奶油卷啊？ ‎我就算吃不下也会拿走

translation.en: [whispering] Could you please just give me a little bit of space?
Okay.
Okay, that's it. I'm Googling therapists.
translation.zh:
‎-你散步散得如何呀？
‎-好吧 够了 ‎我要去谷歌心理治疗师

translation.en: I didn't mean to scare you. Okay?
translation.zh: ‎我不是故意来吓你 好吗？

translation.en: [splutters] I am also trying to make sense of everything.
translation.zh: ‎我也在想办法搞清楚这些事

translation.en: Look, is this happening because of that fight we had?
translation.zh: ‎这一切都是因为我们那次吵架吗？

translation.en: If I had known that was the last time we would see each other, I--
translation.zh:
‎因为要是我知道
‎那会是我们俩最后一次见面的话 我…

translation.en: I would have done things differently too.
Is that why you're here? Be… because of what I said?
translation.zh:
‎所以你才来这里吗？
‎因为我说的话吗？

translation.en: According to…
-Do you mean God? -Val.
A woman? I knew it.
Val's my handler. She's like my temp guardian angel.
translation.zh:
‎瓦尔是我的负责人
‎可以说她是我的临时守护天使

translation.en: In order for me to move up, fingers crossed,
translation.zh: ‎为了让我能到上面去 愿神保佑

translation.en: I'm supposed to help you, my dad, and my mom for some reason.
translation.zh:
‎我必须要来帮助你和我爸
‎不知为什么还有我妈

translation.en: Well, I don't need help.
Look, I didn't make the list.
I wanna show you something.
I found it under your bed.
Your dad took the rest of your stuff.
Um… [smacks lips] You wouldn't recognize your room. -Oh, I saw. -Huh.
translation.zh:
‎-你保证会认不出自己房间的
‎-我看到过了

translation.en: Something told me I should keep it.
translation.zh: ‎某种感觉告诉我 我应该把它留下来

translation.en: -I thought you'd forgotten about me. -What?
translation.zh:
‎-我还以为你把我忘了呢
‎-什么？

translation.en: We've been in each other's lives for as long as I can remember.
translation.zh:
‎自打我有记忆起
‎我们俩就一直在对方的生命中

translation.en: How… how could you think that?
Being dead brings up a lot of insecurities.
translation.zh: ‎死了以后 人会多好多不安全感

translation.en: [Lisa] Are those from your mom?
[Cassie] Yep.
Postcards from all the amazing places she visited after she left us.
translation.zh:
‎来自她离开我们后
‎去过的各种好地方的明信片

translation.en: Hey, uh,
would you… [chuckles]
…maybe wanna puzzle?
You still have it.
[Lisa] Some of the pieces might be missing.
I found it on the floor that morning.
translation.zh: ‎那天早上我在地板上找到的

translation.en: Can't leave Mona without her smile this time.
translation.zh: ‎这回可不能让蒙娜少了微笑

translation.en: Look, I don't know what's happening, and I probably need to schedule an MRI,
translation.zh: ‎我不知道这是怎么回事 ‎我可能需要去做个核磁共振

translation.en: but it is really, really nice to have you back.
translation.zh: ‎但你能回来 我真的很高兴

translation.en: It's really nice to be back.
Hi, Piper.
Are you okay?
No.
-What do you think she does in there? -Money laundering, hacking.
translation.zh: ‎你说她在里面都做什么啊？ ‎洗钱、做黑客

translation.en: Basic roommate stuff.
-This almost feels like old times. -Almost.
translation.zh:
‎-这感觉几乎就像是以前一样
‎-是啊

translation.en: -You know what'd make it better? -Your boyfriend Koop's music?
translation.zh:
‎-知道加什么会更棒吗？
‎-你男朋友库普的音乐？

translation.en: I can't help who I love!
You forget that I introduced you to his greatness.
translation.zh: ‎你忘了是我把他介绍给你的

translation.en: He's my soul mate. Do you know he has a new song?
translation.zh:
‎他可是我的灵魂伴侣
‎他出新歌了吗？

translation.en: -More like a whole album. -Are you serious? I've missed so much.
translation.zh:
‎-出了一整张专辑呢
‎-真的？我真是错过了太多

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. Hey, Google, play "Drive" by Koop.
translation.zh: ‎对 嘿 谷歌 播放库普的《兜风》

translation.en: -Impromptu dance party! -Impromptu dance party!
translation.zh:
‎-即兴热舞派对！
‎-即兴热舞派对！

translation.en: I knew you'd love it!
Hey, hey.
I'm gonna bring it low again. I'm gonna bring it low again.
translation.zh: ‎我要再跳低一点 再跳低一点

translation.en: She's goin'. She's goin'. She's goin', goin', goin'.
-I like this! -[Lisa laughing]
You got good moves.
-There you are. -I don't need food anymore.
Yeah.
-Sorry. -That's okay.
I can't imagine a world without cold noodles.
translation.zh: ‎我简直无法想象一个没有冷面的世界

translation.en: I think I had more dinners at your house than at my own.
translation.zh:
‎我感觉我在你家吃的饭
‎要比在自己家吃的还多

translation.en: Especially during my dad's cooking learning curve. Remember that?
translation.zh:
‎尤其是我爸刚学做饭那会儿
‎还记得吗？

translation.en: -You know my parents love you. -I love them.
translation.zh:
‎-你知道我父母很爱你的
‎-我也爱他们

translation.en: Look, I know that you thought your dad was overprotective.
translation.zh: ‎我知道你认为你爸有点保护过度

translation.en: Smothering. But he did the best he could, Cassie.
translation.zh:
‎-令人窒息
‎-可他已经尽力了 凯茜

translation.en: Yeah.
-Yeah, I'm starting to realize that. -["Drive" ends]
translation.zh: ‎是啊 我开始意识到这点了

translation.en: -[video game music playing] -[Cassie] Is that next door?
Doesn't that get annoying?
I don't find it annoying.
No, no, no! He's just super talented and cute and smart.
translation.zh: ‎不是！只是他很有才华 帅气又聪明

translation.en: Oh, you still have a crush!
What'll you do about this year-long crush?
translation.zh: ‎那你打算拿这一整年的暗恋怎么办？

translation.en: Absolutely nothing.
We're fine the way we are. I…
-I don't wanna mess things up. -What's to mess up?
translation.zh:
‎-我可不想把事情搞砸了
‎-能搞砸什么啊？

translation.en: If you don't go after what you want, how will you get it?
Like that job interview.
You know you want it, but you didn't even sign up.
translation.zh:
‎你明知道自己想去
‎可你却连名都没有报

translation.en: -How do you know about that? -I am everywhere. Duh.
For someone who studies bones, you need to get some in your back.
translation.zh:
‎对于一个研究骨头的人来说
‎你需要挺出脊梁骨来才行

translation.en: -How long have you waited to say that? -When did you declare your major again?
translation.zh: ‎为了说这话你等了多久？ ‎你是什么时候选的专业来着？

translation.en: Since you were digging dirt in your backyard,
translation.zh:
‎自从你在后院里挖泥土开始
‎你就知道你想要做什么

translation.en: you knew what you wanted, and I have always admired that.
translation.zh:
‎自从你在后院里挖泥土开始
‎你就知道你想要做什么 ‎我一直都对这点很敬佩

translation.en: Really? 'Cause you used to tease me pretty hard about being so work-focused.
translation.zh: ‎真的吗？ ‎因为你以前经常嘲笑我围着工作转

translation.en: Okay. Well, that was alive me, and she was so very wrong.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 那是活着时候的我
‎她真是大错特错

translation.en: That's it.
This is why I'm here.
I'm going to get you together with Dreamy Max!
translation.zh:
‎我是来让你
‎和梦中情人麦克斯在一起的！

translation.en: I am sure that there are more substantial reasons why you're here.
translation.zh: ‎我很确信 肯定有更重要的原因…

translation.en: No! Shush. Okay, this is my warm-up.
translation.zh: ‎不 好了 这是我的热身

translation.en: Okay, if we can hear his music, then he can hear ours.
translation.zh:
‎如果我们能听见他的音乐
‎那他就能听见我们

translation.en: And since you aren't going to go to him, it's time for him to come to you.
translation.zh: ‎既然你不可能去找他 ‎那就是时候让他来找你了

translation.en: Hey, Google, replay Koop.
[louder] Replay Koop. Um, I'm not sure she speaks angel.
translation.zh:
‎-重播库普
‎-她好像听不懂天使语

translation.en: A little help, please?
Hey, Google, replay Koop.
Tell her to go louder. We want it to sound like you're having the best time ever.
translation.zh:
‎开大声一点 要让人一听就知道
‎你正在玩得昏天黑地才行

translation.en: Curiosity will hit, and he won't be able to stay away. It's science.
translation.zh:
‎因为好奇心一旦来了
‎他肯定抵挡不了 ‎这是科学

translation.en: Hey, Google, highest volume, please.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 谷歌 把音量调到最高

translation.en: Yes.
-Okay. What do we do now? -Wait for it.
translation.zh:
‎-好了 我们接下来怎么做？
‎-等着就行

translation.en: Three,
two…
What happened to one?
Huh. He's shyer than I thought.
-What are you doing? -Going old school. Knocking on his door.
translation.zh:
‎-等等 你要干嘛去？
‎-我要去敲他的门

translation.en: -What? No! -Yeah. I'm doing it!
Cassie! So embarrassing!
Hi. Hey. Um, I heard you playing music, and I was gonna knock,
translation.zh:
‎嗨 嘿 我听到你在放音乐
‎我正打算来敲门

translation.en: but then I didn't wanna disturb, so I didn't yet.
translation.zh:
‎但我又不想打扰你
‎所以我还没来得及敲

translation.en: -Are you having a party in here? -Who, me? No.
translation.zh:
‎-你是在这里开派对吗？
‎-谁啊？我？没有

translation.en: I'm just rockin' out.
Hey, is it too loud? 'Cause I can turn it down.
translation.zh: ‎是不是太大声了？我可以关小的

translation.en: Hey, hey, Google, turn it off.
No, you didn't have to do that on my account. It's a great song though.
translation.zh:
‎不 你不用为了我这么做的
‎这首歌很棒

translation.en: -Oh, I can turn it back on. -No, not if you don't want to.
translation.zh:
‎-那我可以再开起来
‎-不 如果你不想的话就不用

translation.en: Sorry. Look, you know how we were saying that we wanted to hang out?
translation.zh:
‎抱歉 那个 我们之前不是说
‎想要一起玩吗？

translation.en: Well, uh, Koop's actually shooting a music video tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎正好库普明天要拍一个音乐视频

translation.en: -What? -My friend's directing it.
He wanted to know if I wanted to visit the set.
translation.zh: ‎他问了我想不想去拍摄现场看

translation.en: -So, uh, I thought maybe… -He's chickening out. Invite him in.
translation.zh:
‎所以我就想 或许… ‎-他要退缩了 快请他进来
‎-停

translation.en: -Stop it. -Stop what?
translation.zh:
‎-他要退缩了 快请他进来
‎-停

translation.en: I didn't say anything. Did you say something?
translation.zh:
‎-停什么？
‎-我什么也没说啊 你说的？

translation.en: [coughs] Ask him in.
Do you wanna come in? I think I have some wine.
translation.zh: ‎你想进来吗？我好像有葡萄酒

translation.en: Sure. Yeah. No, I'd… I'd love that.
Okay, okay. Cool shoes.
Mmm. You smell clean. A good start.
translation.zh: ‎闻起来也很干净 头开得不错

translation.en: Yeah, this is pretty much exactly like walking into my place.
translation.zh: ‎哇 这里就像是走进我自己家一样

translation.en: Except a lot bigger and a lot less stuff.
translation.zh: ‎只不过地方更大 东西更少

translation.en: A little obvious, Max. My friend is a genius. You can do better.
translation.zh:
‎有点太明显了 麦克斯
‎我朋友是个天才 想点聪明的出来

translation.en: Shut up. You're a puzzler?
translation.zh: ‎不可能吧 你是拼图爱好者？

translation.en: I'm a puzzler.
Yeah. I can lose myself for days doing one of those.
translation.zh: ‎是的 我有时候一拼就是好几天

translation.en: -I just started up again. -No way.
translation.zh:
‎-我是刚刚重新开始的
‎-不是吧

translation.en: My best friend Cassie and I, we used to puzzle all the time.
translation.zh:
‎我和我最好的朋友凯茜
‎以前经常一起拼图

translation.en: Oh, here. I found it in the back of the fridge,
translation.zh: ‎给你 我在冰箱深处找到的

translation.en: so I'm not sure if it's good.
translation.zh: ‎所以我也不确定还能不能喝

translation.en: Vintage. Nice.
Only the best for you, neighbor.
translation.zh: ‎当然要拿最好的来招待你 邻居

translation.en: -Cheers. -Cheers.
Have you ever been arrested? How is your credit?
translation.zh:
‎对了 麦克斯 你被逮捕过吗？
‎你的信用分怎么样？

translation.en: -[spits] -Oh, are you okay?
translation.zh:
‎对了 麦克斯 你被逮捕过吗？
‎你的信用分怎么样？ ‎-你没事吧？
‎-我没事

translation.en: I'm fine.
It's disgusting. [laughs]
Bottoms up.
[coughs] Well, now we're in it together, right?
Aw, he's adorable.
So it must've, um, been hard, you losing your friend like that.
translation.zh:
‎就这样失去了朋友
‎你肯定很难过吧？

translation.en: -How long's it been? A year? -This week, yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-多久了？一年？
‎-到这周满一年 嗯

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -Thanks.
Though sometimes I just feel like she's actually hovering right over me.
translation.zh:
‎不过有时我感觉
‎她好像就在我身旁 离我很近

translation.en: I'm in the way. Hint taken. I'll be in your room if you need me.
translation.zh:
‎我在做电灯泡 听出来了
‎我去你房间里等

translation.en: How are those dinosaurs of yours? They still extinct?
translation.zh:
‎你的那些恐龙怎么样了？
‎还灭绝着吗？

translation.en: Yeah. That happened.
Um, yeah, I… I mostly work with fossils.
I just find something so comforting in… in holding history in your hands.
translation.zh:
‎我总觉得把历史握在手里
‎这种感觉很让人安心

translation.en: Yeah, I get that. The tangible is easier to believe in, right?
translation.zh:
‎对 我懂
‎摸得着的东西才更容易相信 对吧？

translation.en: Exactly. Yeah, I've always thought that.
translation.zh: ‎没错 对 我就是这么想的

translation.en: -On a scale of one to ten… -Mm-hmm. …how big of a Jurassic Park fan are you?
translation.zh:
‎从1到10的话 你给自己对
‎《侏罗纪公园》的喜爱打几分？

translation.en: -No, like a 20. -[Cassie] Twenty!
She watched it all the time!
All the time.
I… I, um, I watched it a lot.
And Indiana Jones.
I blame my geekiness on those movies actually.
translation.zh: ‎我这么书呆子气 就怪那些电影

translation.en: I like your geekiness.
Late. It's getting late.
Um… I…
I have to work tomorrow.
Yeah, no. Yeah, of course.
Um, well, look,
thanks for having me. [chuckles]
And for the questionable wine. -[Lisa laughs] -That was great.
translation.zh: ‎还有那杯可疑的葡萄酒 也非常棒

translation.en: And I'll see you soon. Yeah?
Yeah, yeah, yeah.
-Cool. -Cool.
-Okay. -Okay.
-Bye. -Bye.
That was a good-ish start. Now you have to learn how to stick the landing.
translation.zh: ‎刚才头开得还不赖 ‎接着你就只要学习如何一锤定音

translation.en: I think I really like him.
Well, then it's good you kicked him out.
translation.zh: ‎是吗？还好你刚才把他赶出去了

translation.en: Okay. I need to go to bed.
And don't watch me sleep tonight. It's creepy.
translation.zh: ‎晚上别看着我睡觉 怪瘆人的

translation.en: Aye, aye, Captain.
Proud of you!
[Lisa] God, I'm so stupid.
What was I even thinking?
Why did I kick him out?
I totally blew it.
So stupid.
"Thanks for the wine"? Who says that? Like she's my waiter for the evening.
translation.zh: ‎“谢谢你的葡萄酒”？谁说这种话啊？ ‎就好像她是我今晚的服务员似的

translation.en: For God's sake, why can't I just ask her out like a normal human being?
translation.zh:
‎我的天啊 为什么我就不能
‎像个正常人那样约她出去呢？

translation.en: I had the chance, and I blew it.
Oh, what was I thinking?
-It was like I was leaving a wake. -They really are made for each other.
translation.zh:
‎-搞得好像我刚守完夜似的
‎-他们俩真的是天生一对

translation.en: Oh. "I like your geekiness"? I mean, who says that?
translation.zh:
‎“我喜欢你的书呆子气”？
‎谁说这种话啊？

translation.en: "Hi. I'm Max, your weird neighbor, and you'll never speak to me again."
translation.zh:
‎“我叫麦克斯 你的怪胎邻居
‎你再也不会跟我讲一句话了”

translation.en: Cool. Nice one, dude. Brilliant. Brilliant. What a corker.
translation.zh: ‎好 干得漂亮 哥们 真是个人才

translation.en: [exhales] Okay.
Oh, so cute. [kisses]
I'm late!
What? Seriously? I don't have time for this, Cassie!
translation.zh:
‎什么？有没有搞错？
‎我可没时间玩这个 凯茜！

translation.en: [scoffs] Right.
[Lisa] Piper, don't forget the rent check!
-["Blush" playing loudly] -Codswallop!
-Hey. -Hey, sorry. I… I didn't see you there.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿
‎-嘿 抱歉 我没看到你

translation.en: I'm a bit of a mess right now. I'm late for work, and I--
translation.zh:
‎我现在乱糟糟的
‎我上班要迟到了 而且我…

translation.en: It's okay. I'm on my way, um, to get some coffee.
translation.zh: ‎没关系 我正要去喝咖啡

translation.en: -Cool. -This is a coincidence.
Yeah, that's… that's one word for it.
Listen, I really should have asked this last night,
but would you wanna go to that Koop music video thing with me?
translation.zh:
‎但你愿意跟我一起
‎去看库普拍音乐视频吗？

translation.en: I thought it'd be cool to see what goes on behind--
translation.zh: ‎我觉得那样会挺不错的 能看到幕后…

translation.en: Yeah. Yes.
Cool. Well, I can pick you up at 4:00, if that works?
translation.zh: ‎好 如果可以的话 我可以4点来接你

translation.en: I'm not exactly a leave-work-early kinda gal, but, yeah, why not?
translation.zh: ‎我不是那种提早下班的女生 ‎但是呢 可以 为什么不呢？

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, 4:00 is great.
-Don't be late. -[both laugh]
What about your coffee?
Right. Yeah, no. Sorry.
I… I forgot I'm actually in the throes of a pretty vicious eBay bidding war
translation.zh:
‎我忘了我正忙着在易贝上
‎跟别人展开一场激烈的竞标大战

translation.en: over the original VHS of David Bowie's the Labyrinth,
translation.zh:
‎为了抢大卫·鲍伊的
‎《魔幻迷宫》原版录影带呢

translation.en: and I really should get back to that.
No rest for the wicked and all that. But I will see you later. Yeah?
translation.zh:
‎忙得不可开交 没时间休息
‎我们晚点见 好吗？

translation.en: -Okay. Yeah, I'll see you later too. -Bye.
Bye.
Thanks, fairy godmother.
-[Sofia] Am I doing it wrong? -[Morgan] Yes.
-[Sofia] Do I got it now? -[Morgan] Yes.
Oh. All right. Time to start Project Get Dad Out of his Funk.
translation.zh:
‎好嘞 是时候开始
‎“让老爸重见天日”计划了

translation.en: What to do first?
Come on, Dad. You know you're tempted to try this out.
translation.zh: ‎来吧 爸 你知道你跃跃欲试很久了

translation.en: That's it? Not even a downward dog?
translation.zh: ‎这就完了？连个下犬式也不做？

translation.en: Your yoga-avoiding daughter is trying to connect here.
translation.zh:
‎你这个避着瑜伽的女儿
‎在努力跟你交流呢

translation.en: I can take a hint, universe.
translation.zh: ‎我看懂你的暗示了 宇宙

translation.en: Or Cassie.
-Ooh, that looks good. -Oh, she always…
-Wear a bell or something. -[scoffs]
Are you trying to shut me out?
I don't want people to think that I'm talking to myself.
translation.zh: ‎我可不想让别人觉得我在自言自语

translation.en: Oh. Look around. Everybody looks like they're talking to themselves.
translation.zh:
‎看看周围吧
‎每个人看起来都像是在自言自语

translation.en: It's talking to each other we have trouble with.
translation.zh: ‎人们有困难的是跟彼此交流

translation.en: -Oh, that's surprisingly deep. -I have my moments.
translation.zh:
‎-没想到还挺有深度的嘛
‎-我也会感慨一下

translation.en: It's been one of those days.
translation.zh: ‎特别是碰上这种不顺利的时候

translation.en: Well, luckily, your best friend is here, even if she is wearing EarPods.
translation.zh:
‎幸运的是 你最好的朋友在听着呢
‎尽管她带着耳机

translation.en: I'm trying to help my dad.
You should see his house. It's a mess. And he stopped doing yoga.
translation.zh:
‎你去看看他家就知道了 一团糟
‎而且他都不做瑜伽了

translation.en: -Wait, seriously? -Yeah.
-That is so unlike him. -[sighs]
Although you know what? He hasn't posted in a while.
translation.zh:
‎不过想来也对
‎他是好一阵子没发东西了

translation.en: Yeah. We can't communicate like you and I, so I'm trying to get creative.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 我跟他没办法像你我这样交流 ‎所以我一直在试各种方法

translation.en: I, uh, I also saw Sofia.
She was with her daughter. My half sister, Morgan.
translation.zh:
‎她跟她女儿在一起
‎我同母异父的妹妹 摩根

translation.en: They were playing at the park. She came to your service.
translation.zh:
‎-她们在公园里玩
‎-她代替了你

translation.en: I wanna be happy for her. I do.
But seeing her so carefree, you know, it hurts,
translation.zh: ‎但见到她那么无忧无虑的样子 ‎很伤人 我感觉很愤怒

translation.en: and I get angry, and it's just…
It's not a very angelic reaction, huh?
translation.zh: ‎这不是一个天使该有的反应

translation.en: I mean, I wouldn't know, but, uh,
it does sound like a pretty human one.
translation.zh: ‎但听起来是人类该有的反应

translation.en: I don't know how I'll make things right before my time is up.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道我要怎么赶在时间到之前
‎把这些事情做好了

translation.en: A little buzz here. Let's see what it is.
translation.zh: ‎震动了一下 我们来看看是谁

translation.en: Wait! Downward Dad is back!
-Whatever you're doing, it's working! -[gasps, laughs]
translation.zh: ‎不知道你做了什么 反正起效果了！

translation.en: So…
So?
-Are you ready for your big date? -Date? What date?
translation.zh:
‎-你准备好去这场盛大的约会了吗？
‎-什么约会？

translation.en: Are you kidding me? I'm freaking out! Why do you think I'm stress eating?
translation.zh: ‎你逗我玩吗？我都吓坏了！ ‎不然你以为我干嘛暴饮暴食？

translation.en: Oh, you're so lucky I came back.
translation.zh: ‎你真走运 还好我回来了

translation.en: I know.
It's okay, right?
This is what you wear when you're sick, and you go to CVS for more cough medicine.
translation.zh:
‎这件衣服是你生病了
‎去药店买咳嗽药时穿的衣服

translation.en: Okay. Hey, now,
we don't all have your never-ending supply of brand-new clothes.
translation.zh:
‎不是每个人都像你一样
‎有无限多的新衣服穿的

translation.en: Love this one.
[gasps] Yes. With red lipstick.
-Okay, don't push it. -Pink lip?
-Fine. -[squeals]
Uh, wait!
-The pink lip. -The pink lip.
Let's see.
Yeah. Yeah, I like it. I li-- I don't know. Is it… is it me?
translation.zh: ‎嗯 我喜欢 我不知道诶 这像我吗？

translation.en: -You look perfect. -Really?
That cutie composer won't know what hit him. Come here.
translation.zh:
‎那个帅哥作曲家
‎肯定会被你迷倒的 来

translation.en: -[knocking at door] -He's here! He's here!
-Ah! Wait, wait, wait! -Okay, come on. Let's go!
translation.zh:
‎-等等！
‎-好了 快 我们走！

translation.en: -Wait! One last thing. Hold on. -[spraying]
translation.zh: ‎等等！还有最后一样 别急

translation.en: -Turn. -Stop spraying me! Stop it! He's here.
translation.zh:
‎-转个身
‎-别喷我了！住手！他来了

translation.en: You look…
Wow. [chuckles]
You look wow yourself.
-After you. -Thank you.
You're welcome.
Thanks.
Mmm. And he has manners.
What are you doing here?
Like I'd miss a chance to see Koop live and in person.
translation.zh: ‎难道我会错过看库普现场的机会？

translation.en: -Don't worry. You won't know I'm here. -Cassie!
translation.zh: ‎放心 你不会注意到我在的 ‎凯茜！

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey.
-[Max] You all right? -Great.
♪ Come on ♪
♪ I think I finally found My favorite thing ♪
translation.zh: ‎我好像终于找到了我最爱的东西

translation.en: ♪ And it's closer than it seems ♪
♪ Open my eyes Girl, can you take me there? ♪
translation.zh:
‎睁开我的眼睛 女孩
‎你能带我去那儿吗？

translation.en: ♪ Have I seen you in a dream? ♪
♪ And it feels like, ooh ♪
♪ Every time I look at your face Your face ♪
translation.zh: ‎每当我看着你的脸庞 你的脸庞

translation.en: ♪ It feels like, ooh ♪
♪ I'm running, but I'm stuck in one place One place ♪
translation.zh:
‎我在奔跑着
‎却又像是被困在原地 困在原地

translation.en: ♪ It only takes one look And I'm into you ♪
♪ There could be A hundred people in the room ♪
♪ If you take a chance You could feel it too ♪
translation.zh: ‎如果你肯给我个机会 你也会感觉到

translation.en: ♪ All it takes is one look One look, one look ♪
translation.zh: ‎钟情只需一见 一见 一见

translation.en: ♪ I'm floating higher… ♪
Thanks.
-For what? -Taking us here.
-We really appreciate it. -We?
Did I say we? I meant me. I really appreciate it.
translation.zh: ‎我说“我们”了吗？ ‎我是说我 我非常感激

translation.en: Well, I'm really glad you're here.
♪ Every time I look at your face Your face ♪
translation.zh: ‎每当我看着你的脸庞 你的脸庞

translation.en: ♪ It feels like, ooh ♪
♪ I'm running But I'm stuck in one place ♪
translation.zh: ‎我在奔跑着 却又像是被困在原地

translation.en: ♪ It only takes one look And I'm into you… ♪
Holy crap.
♪ …a hundred people in the room ♪
♪ If you take a chance You could feel it too ♪
translation.zh: ‎如果你肯给我个机会 你也会感觉到

translation.en: ♪ All it takes is one look, one look ♪
Way to angel block, Val.
translation.zh: ‎你还真是会扫兴啊 瓦尔

translation.en: I know you like him, but he's not on your list.
translation.zh:
‎我知道你喜欢他
‎可他不在你的名单上

translation.en: Can we add him, please? He was right there. I couldn't resist.
translation.zh: ‎我们可以把他加上去吗？求你了 ‎他刚才这么近 我没控制住

translation.en: Please stop glaring. Your disappointed look is weirding me out.
translation.zh: ‎请你别再瞪我了 ‎你这副失望的表情让我很不自在

translation.en: Need I remind you that you're still on the clock, young lady?
translation.zh:
‎需要我提醒你
‎你的时间很有限吗 年轻的女士？

translation.en: You have just two days left, and no one has been marked off your list.
translation.zh:
‎你就只剩两天了
‎名单上一个人都没有被去掉

translation.en: I'm working on it, okay? This is harder than I thought.
translation.zh:
‎我已经在努力了
‎这比我想象中的要难

translation.en: You're on track.
Just stay focused.
Open your heart.
Possibly only a slight upgrade from the back of the fridge.
translation.zh:
‎可能只比冰箱深处的
‎要好上那么一点点

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Pairs best with regret?
[laughs] Yeah.
Uh, to regret.
To regret.
-Cheers. -Cheers.
-Seriously? -Sorry, are we not…
translation.zh:
‎-有没有搞错？
‎-抱歉 我们不是…

translation.en: -I'm-- Sorry. -Are you okay?
My knee cramped up.
I can't believe the terrible timing for a pain like that. It's--
translation.zh: ‎真不敢相信这种时候痛了起来

translation.en: I thought this was… Are we not a thing, or am I just confused?
translation.zh:
‎我以为这是…
‎我们不来电吗？还是说我搞错了？

translation.en: Max, no, I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: ‎麦克斯 不是 我很抱歉

translation.en: I'm just… I'm a little nervous and edgy, and I've got a lot going on.
translation.zh:
‎我有点紧张和激动
‎最近发生了很多事

translation.en: Full confession.
I…
I have liked you since the first time we met.
translation.zh:
‎自从我们第一次见面
‎我就喜欢上你了

translation.en: Yeah?
-Yeah. -Oh.
Full confession. I've liked you since then too.
translation.zh:
‎我向你完全坦白
‎我也是从那时起就喜欢你了

translation.en: And I may regret saying this out loud, but…
translation.zh: ‎还有 这话说出来我可能会后悔 但…

translation.en: I still have this overwhelming desire to kiss you.
translation.zh:
‎我还是有一种强烈的
‎想要吻你的冲动

translation.en: [softly] I like confessions.
You have that good-date glow.
-He wants to go back out again. -[exclaims]
-Sorry for crashing. -[sighs] I was, uh, non-living vicariously through you.
translation.zh:
‎很抱歉打扰你们
‎我刚才可真是个不速之客

translation.en: It's okay. Just… just do me a favor and maybe don't come on any of our other dates.
translation.zh:
‎没关系 但请你帮我一把
‎下次别挑我们约会的时候来

translation.en: No chaperone.
[clicks tongue] Got it.
-I'm glad it went well. -Oh, it really did.
translation.zh:
‎-这么顺利 我很高兴
‎-真的很顺利

translation.en: We spent the entire night just talking.
He's so interesting.
He knows all of these obscure bands.
Plus, um, he even got me this blanket before I said I was cold.
translation.zh:
‎而且他在我说我冷之前
‎就跟我拿了条毯子来

translation.en: Oh, and he smells really, really good. -Like pine and pizza. -[laughs]
translation.zh:
‎而且他闻起来很香
‎就像是松木和比萨

translation.en: -You're falling for him. -Yeah, I am.
Hey.
Why are you crying?
These aren't sad tears.
-Yeah, but they're still tears. -This is your time. It's not about me.
translation.zh:
‎-那也是泪水啊
‎-现在重点是你 我怎么样不重要

translation.en: It's just…
I guess it's starting to hit me that I'm never gonna have a first kiss again,
translation.zh:
‎我才刚刚意识到
‎我再也不会有第一次接吻了

translation.en: or go on an amazing date, or go on a bad date.
translation.zh: ‎或是来一场很棒的约会 又或者… ‎来一场很糟糕的约会

translation.en: But worst of all,
I'm not gonna be here to watch all your career successes.
translation.zh:
‎我没办法看着你
‎获得事业上的一个个成功了

translation.en: I won't be here to watch you walk down the aisle and become a mother.
translation.zh:
‎我没办法在这里看着你结婚
‎成为母亲

translation.en: And, oh, you're gonna be an amazing mom, Lis. Thanks.
translation.zh:
‎-你肯定会是个很棒的妈妈 丽莎
‎-谢谢

translation.en: [voice cracking] Your kids are always gonna know they're loved.
translation.zh:
‎你的孩子们肯定无时无刻都知道
‎自己是被爱着的

translation.en: Plus, they're gonna… [sighs deeply]
…dominate the science fair.
-Oh, they will, won't they? -[chuckles] Yeah.
Sorry, maybe these are sad tears. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎对不起 也许这些真是悲伤的泪水

translation.en: This isn't fair.
No one should have to die young.
I have to believe there's a reason for it.
translation.zh: ‎我不得不相信 这样是有原因的

translation.en: Even if I don't know what it is yet.
-This is all my fault. -No!
If I'd just stayed there with you that night, then none of this would've even happened.
translation.zh:
‎如果那晚我和你待在一起
‎这一切都不会发生

translation.en: No. This was gonna happen no matter what you did. It was my time.
translation.zh:
‎无论你怎么做 这些都会发生的
‎是我的大限到了

translation.en: When… when you were a kid, and your parents would fight,
I was the one who would distract you with a puzzle.
translation.zh: ‎我总会拿拼图出来 帮你分心

translation.en: Yeah, and you had extra PJs for me whenever I didn't wanna go home.
translation.zh:
‎我不想回家的时候
‎你总会有一套额外的睡衣

translation.en: -You've always been there for me. -But that night, I wasn't.
translation.zh:
‎-你总在我身边支持我
‎-可那天晚上我没有

translation.en: I mean, I heard you coming to my door, and I…
translation.zh:
‎我明明听到了
‎你走到我的门口来 而我…

translation.en: I have been mad at myself ever since.
translation.zh: ‎自从那天起 我一直在生自己的气

translation.en: -Hey. -[sniffs]
Don't be.
In a weird way, what happened is a good thing.
translation.zh: ‎从某种程度上来说 这是件好事

translation.en: Now… now you get to live your own life
translation.zh: ‎你现在终于可以过自己的生活

translation.en: and don't have to worry about taking care of me anymore.
translation.zh: ‎不用再担心要怎么照顾我了

translation.en: You don't mean that.
I can't lie. I'm almost an angel.
translation.zh: ‎我说不了谎 我差点就是天使了

translation.en: Well,
I'd like to be there for you one last time.
translation.zh: ‎我想要最后陪在你身边支持你一回

translation.en: I don't know why I'm supposed to care about her.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道我为什么要在乎她

translation.en: She left me, you know?
translation.zh: ‎是她离开我的 你知道吗？

translation.en: But she's on my list, so… [exhales]
translation.zh: ‎可她在我的名单上 所以…

translation.en: Well, hey, if you don't care, then why keep her postcards?
translation.zh:
‎可是 如果你真不在乎
‎你为什么要留下她的明信片呢？

translation.en: How can I help you with your mom?
translation.zh: ‎你妈的事 我要怎么帮你？

translation.en: I can't believe she lives here.
This is exactly what she ran away from.
-Hi. -Hi. I was so glad you called.
translation.zh:
‎-嗨
‎-嗨 你打来电话 我真的很高兴

translation.en: Come in.
Thanks.
I, um, thought we could catch up on the patio.
I made lemonade. Would you like some? I have tea.
translation.zh:
‎我做了柠檬水 要来点吗？
‎我还有茶…

translation.en: I have one of those Jarritos. You used to love those.
translation.zh:
‎我还有加锐得汽水
‎你以前可喜欢喝了

translation.en: Um, I think water is fine. Thanks.
-[Sofia] How are you, Lisa? -Good.
-[Sofia] Still working at the museum? -Yeah.
[Lisa] Yeah, it's been busy, but it's been really good.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 一直很忙 但非常顺利

translation.en: -[Sofia] Good. -How are you?
[Sofia] Busy. Busy with Morgan.
-This is Morgan. -Oh, let me see.
-Oh, she's so cute! -She's like Cassie in a lot of ways.
translation.zh:
‎-她好可爱啊
‎-她在很多方面都很像凯茜

translation.en: Yeah, look, she's got that same mischievous grin.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 看 她也有那副坏坏的笑容

translation.en: They would've liked each other. I always wanted to introduce them,
translation.zh: ‎她们肯定会很喜欢对方的 ‎我本来想介绍她们认识

translation.en: but I wanted Cassie and I to be okay first.
translation.zh: ‎可我想让凯茜和我先相处好

translation.en: I'd like to get started.
So,
I found these in Cassie's box of keepsakes.
translation.zh: ‎我找到了凯茜保存着的这么一盒东西

translation.en: She kept them?
It was my only way to know you. Tell her that, please.
translation.zh: ‎这是我了解你的唯一途径 ‎把这话告诉她

translation.en: Yeah. I think they made her feel closer to you.
translation.zh: ‎我想它们能让她觉得离你更近一些

translation.en: I used to read her Mary Poppins. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎我以前会读《欢乐满人间》给她听

translation.en: She always wanted to see London. Did she ever go?
translation.zh:
‎她一直都很想去看看伦敦
‎她后来有去过吗？

translation.en: No, I didn't go anywhere. I was hoping you would come back to me.
translation.zh:
‎我什么地方都没去
‎整天希望着你会回来找我

translation.en: No, she didn't.
Too bad. She would have loved it.
translation.zh: ‎真可惜 她肯定会很喜欢的

translation.en: Mmm. Her first crush, actually, was this guy who moved here from England.
translation.zh:
‎她第一次喜欢上的人
‎就是从英国搬过来的

translation.en: -Ian. -[Lisa] Ian.
It's one of the many things we have… had in common.
translation.zh: ‎这也是我们的共同点… ‎曾经的共同点之一

translation.en: I missed so much of her life.
It must have been confusing for her, dealing with boys and dating.
translation.zh:
‎对她来说肯定很迷茫
‎对付男生还有谈恋爱什么的

translation.en: Yeah, but my mom was there for both of us to answer some of the tough questions, so…
translation.zh: ‎是啊 但有我妈帮助我们俩 ‎回答了不少这样困难的问题

translation.en: Ask her why she left.
I'm sure that this is, like, really hard to talk about, but, um…
Cassie always wanted to know why you left.
translation.zh:
‎但凯茜一直很想知道
‎你为什么会离开

translation.en: There's not one reason.
What did I do to make you leave?
Was it something Cassie did?
No, never.
Cassie, she was an angel.
It was all me.
I…
I was young.
And I thought I knew more than anyone around me.
translation.zh: ‎自以为自己知道的比周围的人都多

translation.en: Sounds like Cassie.
I, uh, had this romantic idea of what I thought being a wife and mother was like.
translation.zh:
‎我对做妻子和母亲
‎有一个很浪漫的想象

translation.en: But in reality,
I wasn't ready to be responsible for anyone.
translation.zh: ‎我没做好为任何人负责的准备

translation.en: Looking back at it, I see how patient and loving Howie was,
translation.zh:
‎现在回头看
‎我能看出霍伊有多耐心和有爱

translation.en: but at the time,
I found that suffocating.
I said the same thing.
For a while, Howie used to send me
translation.zh: ‎有好一阵子 霍伊都会发给我

translation.en: pictures and letters,
telling me about her.
I never knew that.
But I was too ashamed to respond, so he stopped.
translation.zh: ‎但我羞于回应 于是他停止了

translation.en: I convinced myself that postcards were an adequate placeholder,
translation.zh:
‎我说服了自己
‎寄些明信片就算当了妈了

translation.en: and one day I'd be able to explain it all, and we'd actually laugh about it.
translation.zh:
‎觉得将来有一天我会有机会解释
‎我们俩都能一笑了之

translation.en: Sounds so ridiculous when I say it out loud.
translation.zh:
‎听我这样大声说出来
‎这话真是太荒谬了

translation.en: I… I let her down.
The last time I saw her was college graduation,
translation.zh:
‎我最后一次见她
‎是在大学毕业典礼上

translation.en: and we were like strangers.
I remember.
Now it's too late to make it right.
translation.zh: ‎现在一切都为时已晚 没办法弥补了

translation.en: And I'll never forgive myself for that.
translation.zh: ‎我一辈子也没办法原谅自己

translation.en: Okay, I've heard enough. [clears throat] I need to go.
translation.zh: ‎好了 我听够了 我要走了

translation.en: If Cassie was here right now,
what would you say to her?
What are you doing? I didn't ask that.
translation.zh: ‎你干什么啊？我可没要你这样问

translation.en: That I regret not taking her to London.
I should have been there
to help her with her homework,
hold her when she had a nightmare.
I made a lot of selfish decisions.
But one thing that never changed--
One thing that never changed was my love for her. [clears throat]
If Cassie were here…
I would tell her that the day she was born
translation.zh: ‎我会告诉她 她出生的那一天

translation.en: was one of the brightest moments of my life.
translation.zh: ‎是我此生最开心的时刻之一

translation.en: And running away,
it was my worst.
I just hope she knows how sorry I am.
translation.zh: ‎我只希望她能知道我有多抱歉

translation.en: She does.
She knows.
Are you okay?
[Lisa] Hey.
Hey.
How are we supposed to we finish this if we don't have all the pieces?
translation.zh:
‎如果没有全部的碎片
‎那我们要怎么把图拼完啊？

translation.en: God, this is so frustrating. Why did you even choose this puzzle?
translation.zh:
‎这真是太令人沮丧了
‎你为什么要选这个拼图？

translation.en: Uh, you sure you wanna talk about the puzzle?
translation.zh: ‎你确定你想要聊的是拼图吗？

translation.en: Do you know how hard it was not being able to say everything I wanted to her?
translation.zh:
‎你知道有话想说却不能说的滋味
‎有多让人难受吗？

translation.en: I really don't.
I have years of questions.
translation.zh: ‎这么多年来 我有这么多的问题

translation.en: Yet standing next to her, I found that I just wanted to yell or run away.
translation.zh:
‎可当我站在她身边时
‎却发现自己只想大吼或是逃走

translation.en: Like mother, like daughter.
Yeah, but you didn't, and that's a really good thing.
Would you have translated if I did?
translation.zh: ‎如果我那样 你会替我转达吗？

translation.en: It upset me that you took the conversation over.
translation.zh:
‎当你自己做主把对话抢过去后
‎我感到非常生气

translation.en: No, no. I didn't take anything over.
I could tell that she needed to talk to you,
translation.zh: ‎我看得出 她有话想要跟你说

translation.en: and you needed to hear what she had to say.
translation.zh: ‎而你也需要听到她要说的话

translation.en: That was for me to decide!
-I'm on your side, Cassie. -Ugh.
translation.zh: ‎我是站在你这边的 凯茜

translation.en: I could tell she needed to talk. You needed to hear what she had to say!
translation.zh: ‎我看出她有话想要跟你说 ‎你也需要听到她要说的话

translation.en: You don't get it!
How could you?
You have a perfect life, a perfect future. I have none of those.
translation.zh:
‎你有一个完美的人生
‎一个完美的未来 ‎这些我都没有

translation.en: Okay, okay. You're mad at your mom. That's totally understandable, but…
translation.zh: ‎好了 你在生你妈的气 ‎这我完全理解 可是…

translation.en: You know what? It's… [sighs]
It's not okay for you to take it out on me.
translation.zh: ‎你这样全发泄在我身上是不对的

translation.en: Sorry. Does my messy non-life make you uncomfortable?
translation.zh:
‎真抱歉
‎是不是我混乱的鬼生让你不舒服了？

translation.en: Here we go again. Classic.
I died before I ever got a chance to live!
translation.zh: ‎我连真正的生活还没开始就死掉了！

translation.en: Well, I'm hurt too! Did you think about that, huh?
translation.zh:
‎这件事 我也很受伤！
‎你有没有想过？

translation.en: God, after our fight,
after you left, I had to carry around the guilt of our fight.
translation.zh:
‎在你离开之后
‎我走到哪儿都带着我们吵架的愧疚

translation.en: I had to pick up the pieces, put my life back together without you.
translation.zh: ‎收拾残局 ‎在没有你的情况下把生活继续下去

translation.en: Well, you did a great job. Look around! There's nothing left of me!
translation.zh: ‎你做得很棒 ‎看看周围 根本没有我的痕迹

translation.en: I've been reduced to a box of knickknacks!
translation.zh: ‎我就只剩下一个小盒子的摆设而已

translation.en: After everything that's happened, I can't believe we're back to arguing.
translation.zh:
‎在发生了这么多事后
‎我真不敢相信我们还在吵架

translation.en: Yeah.
Well, I'm dead,
so you don't have to worry about arguing with me ever again.
translation.zh: ‎你再也不用担心跟我吵架了

translation.en: You cannot bring that anger in here.
Look, I… I met with my mom. I got Lisa a boyfriend.
translation.zh: ‎我见了我妈 还给丽莎找了个男朋友

translation.en: I've been talking to my dad even though he can't hear me.
translation.zh:
‎我还跟我爸谈过了
‎尽管他听不到我说话

translation.en: Isn't that enough? Do I have to go back?
translation.zh: ‎这些还不够吗？还得让我回去？

translation.en: Well, not if you don't want to.
Thank you.
Well, then, why don't I just walk you over to the elevator?
translation.zh: ‎好 不如就让我陪你走到电梯那边去

translation.en: When you get there, hit "B" for Below.
translation.zh: ‎等你到了那边后 按下“B”键去下面

translation.en: -Very funny. I get it. -No, you don't.
translation.zh:
‎-真搞笑 我懂了
‎-不 你不懂

translation.en: Why would you risk throwing away everything you've worked toward?
translation.zh:
‎你好不容易得来的进展
‎为什么要这样全丢掉？

translation.en: And over an argument?
You were doing so well.
-You think I'm doing well? -Yes, I do. Don't you?
translation.zh:
‎-你觉得我做得好？
‎-对 你不觉得吗？

translation.en: I don't know. Maybe.
I hoped I wouldn't have to tell you this, but here we are.
translation.zh:
‎我原本希望不用跟你说这个的
‎但现在不得不说了

translation.en: If you really want this to end now, I can make that happen.
translation.zh: ‎如果你真想立刻把一切结束掉的话 ‎我现在就能帮你

translation.en: But just know, if you leave the list unfinished,
translation.zh: ‎但你要知道 如果你没完成名单

translation.en: then all the good you've been doing will be undone.
translation.zh: ‎你所做的一切好事 全都会被抹去

translation.en: Poof.
Everything?
Lisa?
My dad? Everything.
Oh, that's… that's terrible.
I can't… I can't do that to them.
-[exhales sharply] -So, you've made your decision?
Dad, I really need to talk--
translation.zh: ‎爸 我真的很需要跟你谈…

translation.en: -What is she doing here? -More tea?
Please.
I still can't believe you left your accounting practice
translation.zh: ‎我到现在也不敢相信你不做会计

translation.en: to open a yoga studio.
You always joked about it, but I never thought you'd actually do it.
translation.zh:
‎你以前开玩笑说过
‎但我怎么也想不到你会真这么做
