translation.en: [Howard] I also joked about becoming a drummer in an '80s cover band.
translation.zh:
‎我还开玩笑说过
‎要给一个80年代翻唱乐队做鼓手呢

translation.en: -[chuckles] I remember that one. -This was a better lifestyle choice.
translation.zh:
‎-这我记得
‎-这个选择更适合我的生活方式

translation.en: [chuckles] It suits you.
You might not have said that a few days ago.
translation.zh: ‎换了几天前 你可能就不会这么说了

translation.en: This past year has been a challenge.
translation.zh: ‎过去的这一年是个很大的挑战

translation.en: [Sofia] You know, Lisa visited me today.
I know this may sound nutty.
translation.zh: ‎我知道这么说听起来很离谱

translation.en: During that visit, it…
it was almost as though Cassie were standing right beside me.
translation.zh: ‎感觉好像凯茜就站在我身边似的

translation.en: I know what you mean.
She was a lot like you though.
Fearless, independent.
She'd dive headfirst into… [chuckles] …any situation.
translation.zh: ‎遇上任何情况 她总会先做了再说

translation.en: But more than anything,
translation.zh: ‎最重要的是 她充满了活力

translation.en: she was this force of energy who lit up every room she entered.
translation.zh: ‎最重要的是 她充满了活力 ‎能点亮每一个房间

translation.en: After Lisa left, I, um…
I had this overwhelming urge to see you.
translation.zh: ‎我有一种强烈的冲动要来见你

translation.en: I just need you to know how deeply sorry I am for walking out.
translation.zh:
‎我只是想让你知道
‎我对于抛弃你们有多歉疚

translation.en: It wasn't how I saw life going, that's for sure.
translation.zh: ‎那确实不是我预料到的人生方向

translation.en: Your leaving forced me to become a better man, a better parent,
translation.zh:
‎但你的离开迫使我变成了
‎一个更好的男人 一个更好的家长

translation.en: even when she didn't want me to,
and I hope that in some way I was able to minimize whatever scars she had.
translation.zh:
‎我希望在某种程度上
‎我已经将她所受的伤痕减到最小

translation.en: Yeah, I know you did.
[clears throat] Look, I've kept you long enough.
Thanks for this. [chuckles]
You know, I don't know if it's the palo santo in the air
translation.zh: ‎我不知道是因为空气中圣檀木的香味

translation.en: or this dandelion tea talking,
but I feel as though Cassie, wherever she is--
translation.zh:
‎但我觉得凯茜
‎虽然不知道她在哪里 好像…

translation.en: Brought us back together.
[Cassie] Mom, wait!
I forgive you.
So proud of you.
That felt good.
I can tell. I mean, you seem lighter.
translation.zh: ‎我能看出来 你看起来整个人都轻了

translation.en: Hey, so, um…
I need a favor. It's for a good cause, I swear!
translation.zh:
‎我需要你帮个忙
‎是为了做好事 我发誓！

translation.en: No swearing.
I didn't actually swear!
There's this bakery, and the owner seems like a really thoughtful person.
translation.zh:
‎有那么一家烘焙店
‎主人似乎是个非常贴心的人

translation.en: I know she's not on my list, but I think I can help her and help my dad.
translation.zh: ‎我知道她不在我的名单上 ‎但我觉得我能帮她一下 并且帮我爸

translation.en: We're not running a matchmaking service here.
I know, but they could both use a kind person in their life.
translation.zh: ‎我明白 但我觉得他俩都需要伴侣

translation.en: This could also be a thank-you to Emme for being such a good friend to Lisa since I've been gone.
translation.zh:
‎这也算是对艾米的一种感谢
‎感谢她做丽莎的好朋友

translation.en: I've never had anyone want to add to their list before.
translation.zh:
‎我还从没见过任何一个
‎想要在名单上加名字的人

translation.en: I've also never had anyone like you before.
translation.zh: ‎但像你这样的人我也是头一回见

translation.en: [clicks tongue] I'll allow it.
-[exclaiming] Thank you! -Oh!
You're the best! Thank you! Thank you!
Yeah, but you're still on the same timeline. Tomorrow is your last day, Cassie.
translation.zh:
‎可你的时限还是没有变
‎明天是你的最后一天

translation.en: I got this. [sighs]
Perfect.
I can't leave it like this. It's a bakery, not Grandma's basement.
translation.zh:
‎我可不能放手不管
‎这是一家烘焙坊 不是奶奶的地下室

translation.en: Are you behind this too, Cassie?
I like your faith in me, Dad.
translation.zh: ‎我喜欢你对我的信任 爸

translation.en: [Sofia] Morgan, mijita, are you dressed?
translation.zh: ‎摩根 女儿 穿好衣服了吗？

translation.en: [in Spanish] We're leaving in five minutes.
[in English] We don't wanna be late again.
Would you like some tea?
You can see me?
I saw you at the park too.
Aren't you scared?
You're my guardian angel.
Ask your mom to read this to you.
I will.
This is our secret, okay?
translation.zh: ‎这是我们之间的秘密 好吗？

translation.en: [woman whispers] Dr. Redding.
I wish Cassie was here.
[Cassie] I'm right here.
Hey.
Hey.
I do have a piece of you.
-It's from our very first puzzle. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-这是我们拼的第一幅图上的
‎-是啊

translation.en: It's, uh, it's kinda like my lucky charm.
I thought you were done with me.
There are no grudges in the afterlife.
Are there any here?
No. No, no. I do not wanna lose any more time with you.
translation.zh:
‎没有 我不想再失去
‎任何一秒与你一起的时间了

translation.en: -[sobs] Neither do I. -[whispering] No, no, no!
-I don't think I can explain an air hug. -Good point.
translation.zh:
‎-我可没办法解释为什么要抱空气
‎-有道理

translation.en: Yeah.
Okay, so what's the problem? Why are you hesitating?
translation.zh:
‎那么 有什么问题吗？
‎你在犹豫什么？

translation.en: This is yours to lose.
Yeah, exactly.
Cassie, what if I don't get it? What then?
You'll survive, and you'll go on to something even better.
translation.zh:
‎那你也不会死啊
‎你可以继续去做更好的事

translation.en: No. No.
[sighs] Look at me. Do you want this?
translation.zh: ‎看着我 你想要这份工作吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Are you the best person for this job?
translation.zh:
‎-想啊
‎-你是最能胜任这份工作的人吗？

translation.en: [hesitates] Yeah.
I'm not buying that yeah. You gotta try again. Are you the best person for this?
translation.zh:
‎我不相信 你得再说一次
‎你是最能胜任这份工作的人吗？

translation.en: Yeah! I am the best person for this!
translation.zh: ‎对！我就是最能胜任这份工作的人！

translation.en: Yes! There's my strong friend! Life is too short to be fearful.
translation.zh:
‎我坚定的朋友回来了！
‎人生苦短 没时间畏手畏脚

translation.en: Yeah, Cassie, I eat, I sleep, I drink this job.
translation.zh:
‎对啊 凯茜
‎我吃饭睡觉喝水都在为这份工作准备

translation.en: If I got this job, I'd crush it so hard, they'd name a freaking fossil after me.
translation.zh:
‎如果得到了这份工作
‎我肯定会干得非常出色 ‎他们保证会以我来命名化石的

translation.en: -I would-- -Use that energy and go sign up!
translation.zh:
‎-我肯定…
‎-用好这份精神 快去报名吧！

translation.en: Right! Sign up first. Dominate second.
-Yes. -[exhales sharply, grunts]
Oh, I've created a monster.
I love it.
Phew. Bam, bam. Good luck.
Hi. [chuckles]
I've heard nice things about you, Lisa.
translation.zh: ‎我听说过了不少对你的称赞 丽莎

translation.en: -Thanks. -I'm glad you decided to interview.
And last too.
That's a bold move.
Shows the competition you're not worried about who came before.
translation.zh:
‎说明你根本不担心
‎在你前面会有怎样的竞争对手

translation.en: Oh, um, I didn't plan that--
Modesty's a myth that was sold to women a long time ago.
translation.zh:
‎“女子该谦逊”
‎是古时候编出来骗女人的

translation.en: Be proud of your work.
Why paleontology?
I love digging in dirt,
and I hated when people told me that it wasn't a proper career for a lady.
translation.zh:
‎我最讨厌的就是别人告诉我
‎这不是一份适合女士的职业

translation.en: But, uh, mostly, I found it comforting studying what is real.
translation.zh:
‎但最主要的是 ‎我觉得研究什么是真的
‎很让人感到宽慰

translation.en: With fossils, it's like this tangible connection to the past, you know?
translation.zh:
‎可以说化石就是某种摸得着的
‎与过去的联系 对吧？

translation.en: But, uh, now I've… I've started learning from what I…
translation.zh:
‎而如今我开始
‎从一些我看不见的东西那儿

translation.en: I can't see.
-Bye. -Bye.
-Bye. -See you.
Cassie?
-I got it! I got it! -[screaming]
-I got the job! I got it! -You got it! [squeals]
translation.zh: ‎我拿到这份工作了！ ‎你成功了！

translation.en: Thank you so much for the push. I couldn't have done it without you.
translation.zh:
‎谢谢你 谢谢你推我一把
‎没有你的话 我是肯定做不到的

translation.en: -It was all you. -No, I can't even believe I did it.
translation.zh:
‎-全都是你的功劳
‎-我真不敢相信我成功了

translation.en: -Um, I can! -This is, like, the best day of my life.
translation.zh:
‎-我敢
‎-这是我人生中最美好的一天

translation.en: -So proud of you! -Thank you.
So, are you gonna come to Emme's tonight? I'm bringing Max.
translation.zh:
‎今晚你会来艾米的店里吗？
‎我会带麦克斯来

translation.en: I wouldn't miss it.
You made it!
[Emme] Thank you so much for coming.
Excuse me. Hello.
I think I'm in the right place?
If you're here for the party, then yes, you are. I'm Emme.
translation.zh:
‎如果你是来参加派对的
‎那就对了 我叫艾米

translation.en: Would you like a homemade fortune cookie?
translation.zh: ‎你想来一块自制的幸运饼干吗？

translation.en: -Don't mind if I do. -[Emme chuckles]
-"You don't need to look any further." -[Emme] Oh.
I guess this is the right place.
How did you hear about my little soiree?
translation.zh: ‎你是从哪儿听说我这个小晚会的？

translation.en: Honestly, my home was filled with your fliers.
translation.zh: ‎说实话 我家里放满了你的传单

translation.en: No explanation. I have my suspicions, but no one would believe them.
translation.zh:
‎无缘无故地
‎虽然我有自己的怀疑 但根本没人信

translation.en: Well, since we're being honest,
my shop didn't look like this when I closed up last night.
translation.zh:
‎昨晚我关门时
‎我的店还不是这个样子

translation.en: I woke up this morning, and voilà.
translation.zh: ‎今早一起床 就成了这样

translation.en: I've got my suspicions too.
Someone's either looking out for us, or we need to get our locks changed.
translation.zh:
‎不是有人在照顾我们
‎就是我们需要把锁换一下了

translation.en: Can I get you a green tea?
-I've got sencha, matcha-- -Matcha?
Of course.
-What did you say your name was again? -Howard.
-Some people call me Howie. -Howard.
It means "strong heart."
Well, that went better than expected.
It is fascinating the many ways that people can make a living, isn't it?
translation.zh:
‎说来真有意思
‎人们谋生的手段有这么多

translation.en: -Look at that. -Come on.
Okay.
[Emme] I'd really love to do gluten and dairy-free.
translation.zh: ‎我很想做些无麸质和无奶制品的东西

translation.en: That's a new development.
Come on. I'll introduce you.
[Emme] Hey, look.
-Hi, Mr. Garcia. -Lisa!
-Hi. -Oh!
-What are you doing here? -I could ask you the same.
translation.zh:
‎-你怎么来这里了？
‎-我也想问同样的问题呢

translation.en: -Welcome to the party. -Hi, Emme! Hi!
translation.zh:
‎-欢迎来参加派对
‎-嗨 艾米！嗨！

translation.en: She's one of my regulars. And I suspect is some of the reason I had this makeover.
translation.zh:
‎她是我的常客之一
‎我怀疑也是这里改头换面的原因之一

translation.en: If only I knew how you got in here.
translation.zh: ‎要是我知道你怎么进来就好了

translation.en: Well, I'll never tell.
So this is Max. He's, um,
my…
[splutters] Boyfriend. Hi.
-Uh, wait, sorry. Is that cool? -One hundred percent.
translation.zh:
‎-等等 抱歉 我能这么说吗？
‎-百分百

translation.en: And how do you two know each other?
Lisa and my daughter were best friends.
translation.zh: ‎丽莎和我女儿曾是最要好的朋友

translation.en: -What? Are you Cassie's dad? -Yeah.
[Emme] I've heard a lot about her.
Um, I just have to make a call. I'll be right back.
translation.zh: ‎我得去打个电话 马上回来

translation.en: -All right. -Okay.
Someone has been busy. Are you still playing Cupid?
translation.zh: ‎看来有人一直在忙活啊 ‎你还在扮演丘比特吗？

translation.en: Can I help it if their paths crossed? [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎他们碰巧遇上 我又有什么办法？

translation.en: You still can't talk to him, huh?
No.
It's my last day. But he seems happier, and that's what's important.
translation.zh: ‎今天是我的最后一天 ‎但他看起来更开心了这才是最重要的

translation.en: Huh.
What's with the "huh"?
You can go anywhere I can go, right?
translation.zh: ‎你可以去任何我能去的地方 对吧？

translation.en: I mean, if I'm needed. Why?
translation.zh: ‎如果你需要我的话 怎么了？

translation.en: After this party, I need you to find me. No questions asked.
translation.zh:
‎派对结束后
‎我需要你来找我 不许问为什么

translation.en: -What are you up to? -You're not the only one with surprises.
translation.zh:
‎-你打算搞什么把戏啊？
‎-你又不是唯一会搞惊喜的人

translation.en: You have to find me after and not before, okay?
translation.zh:
‎你必须在结束后才来找我
‎不能在之前 好吗？

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay.
[Lisa] Hey, everyone.
I wanna thank you so very much for coming.
We're obviously here because of our beloved Cassie,
translation.zh:
‎我们来这里
‎当然是为了我们深爱的凯茜

translation.en: um, who left us a year ago this week, but, um,
translation.zh: ‎她在一年前的这一周离开了我们

translation.en: I really don't want this to be about loss
translation.zh: ‎但我不想让今晚围绕在失去上

translation.en: because this is also the week that she came into our lives.
translation.zh: ‎因为这也是她进入我们生命中的一周

translation.en: One thing we know about our Cassie is that her joyous life was a party.
translation.zh: ‎关于凯茜 有一件事我们都很清楚 ‎那就是她充满欢乐的人生是一场派对

translation.en: Especially the week of her birthday, or as she called it…
translation.zh:
‎尤其是她生日的那一周
‎按她的叫法也就是…

translation.en: -Cassie-palooza. -Cassie-palooza.
[smacks lips] So, these wish lanterns that you're holding
translation.zh: ‎所以呢 你们手上握着的这些许愿灯

translation.en: will carry whatever you wanna say to her.
translation.zh: ‎将乘载着你们想要对她说的任何话语

translation.en: And as they float across the water,
translation.zh:
‎当它们漂到水的那一端时
‎你们的思念

translation.en: your thoughts will be sent to her.
translation.zh:
‎当它们漂到水的那一端时
‎你们的思念 ‎也会被送到她那里

translation.en: [whispers] Okay, Morgan, why don't you go first? Okay?
translation.zh: ‎好 摩根 不如就从你开始吧？好吗？

translation.en: Hey. This entire time, I thought I was the one helping all of you, but…
translation.zh:
‎嘿 这段时间来
‎我一直以为是我在帮助你们

translation.en: all this has me realizing that…
you were the ones helping me.
I'm not… I'm not ready to lose you again.
We got a second chance. Not everyone can say that.
translation.zh:
‎我们得到了第二次机会
‎不是每个人都能这样

translation.en: I want you to know you're more than just my best friend
translation.zh:
‎我想让你知道
‎你不仅仅是我最要好的朋友

translation.en: and my puzzle partner, okay?
You're my family.
[sobs] And you're mine.
I couldn't imagine going through this life or any other without you.
translation.zh:
‎我无法想象在没有你的陪伴下
‎度过我的人生或来世

translation.en: ♪ I may not always love you ♪
translation.zh: ‎或许我不能每时每刻都爱着你

translation.en: ♪ But as long as there are… ♪
Wait, that's it.
That's the song he would always sing to me as a kid.
translation.zh: ‎我小时候他总唱给我听的就是这首歌

translation.en: ♪ You never need to doubt it ♪
♪ I'll make you so sure about it ♪
♪ 'Cause God only knows What I'd be without you ♪
translation.zh:
‎因为只有上帝知道
‎没有你我会是个什么样

translation.en: He can't hear me.
Hey, we'll do this together, okay?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 我们一起唱吧 好吗？

translation.en: ♪ If you should ever leave me ♪
♪ Though life would still go on Believe me ♪
translation.zh: ‎生活会继续向前 相信我

translation.en: [Lisa and Cassie] ♪ The world could show nothing to me ♪
♪ So what good would living do me? ♪
translation.zh: ‎那么活着对我来说有又何意义？

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause God only knows What I'd be without you ♪
translation.zh:
‎因为只有上帝知道
‎没有你我会是个什么样

translation.en: ♪ God only knows what I'd be without you ♪
translation.zh:
‎只有上帝知道
‎没有你我会是个什么样

translation.en: I'm not afraid to go anymore, Dad.
I love you, pumpkin.
I love you too, Dad.
I gotta go.
Bye.
Bye.
You're cutting it a bit close.
I always like to be the last one to leave a party.
translation.zh: ‎我总喜欢最后一个离开派对

translation.en: Wait, please. I have to find one last thing.
translation.zh:
‎等等 求你了
‎我还得去找最后一样东西

translation.en: We have to be back before time runs out. You don't want to tempt fate.
translation.zh: ‎我们必须在时间结束前回去 ‎玩弄命运是不会有好下场的

translation.en: -It's important. It's for Lisa. -Cassie!
translation.zh:
‎-这事很重要 是为了丽莎
‎-凯茜！

translation.en: [Cassie gasps] There it is!
I found it! The final piece. The list is complete.
translation.zh: ‎我找到了！最后一块 名单完成了

translation.en: -What's that look? -Your time is up.
translation.zh:
‎-你这是什么表情？
‎-你的时间到了

translation.en: Happy birthday, Cassie.
-What did they decide? -Well, you missed your deadline.
translation.zh:
‎-他们怎么决定的？
‎-你错过了最后的期限

translation.en: There's no getting around that.
We also broke the rules by going off the list.
translation.zh:
‎我们还违反了规定
‎找了名单之外的人

translation.en: However, you did those things in good faith.
translation.zh: ‎可是呢 你做的这些都是出于善意

translation.en: The fact you'd risk your afterlife to help someone not on your list
translation.zh:
‎你冒着危及身后事的风险
‎去帮助名单之外的人

translation.en: and take full responsibility to protect me,
translation.zh: ‎并且一人承担所有责任来保护我

translation.en: well, I mean, it's just… it's beyond selfless.
So you're not in trouble?
Even better.
Thanks to your testimony,
I've been promoted.
[screams] You have? Val, that's amazing!
I know! [laughs]
Yeah.
I'm afraid to ask, but…
what about me?
It's time to find out.
And for my last job…
[sobs] I'm gonna miss you, Val.
The world is a better place with you watching over it.
translation.zh: ‎有了你的看护 这个世界会更美好的

translation.en: I was your favorite, wasn't I?
Cassie,
you know I don't pick favorites.
-[chimes] -[both exclaim]
-We did it! -No, you did it.
translation.zh:
‎-我们成功了！
‎-不 你成功了

translation.en: The Above is waiting.
[mouthing] Thank you.
Going up?
Okay, I have to address the elephant in the elevator.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我必须先把事情挑明了

translation.en: -Muzak, really? -You're Kooper Keene!
translation.zh:
‎-木扎克 真的？
‎-你是库普·基恩

translation.en: I think it's meant as a compliment since we're both in here together.
translation.zh:
‎这应该是褒奖吧
‎我们俩一起在往上去

translation.en: We're here together?
Like, how can this be real? Is this real? Are you real?
translation.zh:
‎这怎么可能是真的啊？
‎这是真的吗？你是真的吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] Yes, I am.
It's nice to meet you, Cassie.
You know my name? [laughs]
How? Why?
Funny story.
I was volunteering in a disaster relief area
when disaster struck again.
I was able to save a few people, but I didn't make it.
translation.zh:
‎我成功地救下了几个人
‎但自己没活下来

translation.en: I am so sorry. There's worse ways to go.
translation.zh:
‎-真抱歉
‎-更糟糕的死法多着呢

translation.en: Yeah, there sure are.
Val was in the angel committee that sent me straight up.
translation.zh:
‎瓦尔是天使委员会的成员
‎她直接送我上来了

translation.en: She said that we were supposed to meet.
This is gonna sound really weird,
um, but I feel like I've always known you.
So do I. [chuckles]
What now?
I don't know.
I've never been dead before.
Shall we do this?
[Cassie] Let's do this.
[mouthing] Thank you.
♪ What brings you up Can only leave you low ♪ ♪ I lie awake and wonder where I'll go ♪ ♪ In the unknown ♪
